txt_en: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start now and make a new ending.
txt_cn: 没有人可以回到过去重新开始，但谁都可以从现在开始，书写一个全然不同的结局。

txt_en: I don’t have an attitude, just a personality you can’t handle.
txt_cn: 我有的不是态度，而是一种你无法驾驭的个性。

txt_en: Destiny is not a matter of chance, it is a matter of choice; it is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
txt_cn: 主宰命运的不是机会，而是选择；机会不是等来的，是争取来的。

txt_en: A true friend is someone who accepts your past, supports your present and encourages your future.
txt_cn: 真正的朋友会接受你的过去，力挺你的现在，鼓舞你的将来。

txt_en: Not everything makes sense. Not everything has to.
txt_cn: 不是每件事都解释得通，也不是每件事都必须解释得通。

txt_en: Let me tell you something my friend: Hope is a dangerous thing. Hope can drive a man insane.
txt_cn: 听我说，朋友，希望是件危险的事。希望能叫人发疯。

txt_en: Look yourself in the mirror and ask yourself, what do I want to do everyday for the rest of my life … Do that.
txt_cn: 问镜子里的自己，接下来的日子我每天想做什么… 然后去做。

txt_en: Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit, and you reap a character. Sow a character, and you reap a destiny.
txt_cn: 行为发展成习惯，习惯发展为性格，性格伴随人的一生。

txt_en: Seems right now, that all I have done in my life was making my way here to you.
txt_cn: 我今天才知道，我之所以漂泊就是在向你靠近。

txt_en: Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
txt_cn: 过自己想要的生活不是自私，要求别人按自己的意愿生活才是。

txt_en: Please don't deceive yourself. Don't let yourself get too tired.
txt_cn: 请别再欺骗你自己，别让自己活得太累。

txt_en: I don't want to be someone that you're settling for. I don't want to be someone that anyone settles for.
txt_cn: 我不想要你将就,我也不想成为任何人将就的对象。

txt_en: Never put your happiness in someone else's hands.
txt_cn: 永远不要把自己的幸福放到别人的手中。

txt_en: Weep no more, no sigh, nor groan. Sorrow calls no time that’s gone.
txt_cn: 别哭泣，别叹息，别呻吟；悲伤唤不回流逝的时光。

txt_en: You will meet two kinds of people in life: ones who build you up and ones who tear you down. But in the end, you'll thank them both.
txt_cn: 生命中你会遇到两种人：一种是鼓励你的人，一种是打击你的人，最终，这两者都要感谢。 ​​​​

txt_en: Life turns out to be better only if you think from others' perspective.
txt_cn: 懂得换位思考，人生才会更美好。

txt_en: When you are afraid of losing something ,it means that you have no choice but to abandon it or give up yourself.
txt_cn: 当你害怕失去一样东西时，这意味着，你要么放弃这样东西，要么放弃你自己。

txt_en: If you constantly regret things you did or didn't do in the past, then you won't be able to move forward. Don't live in the past. Live in the present…and the future!
txt_cn: 要是总为过去的事后悔，那你会很难继续前行。不要沉溺于往事。活在当下，看向未来！

txt_en: Once we dreamt that we were strangers. We wake up to find that we were dear to each other.
txt_cn: 我们一度梦见彼此是陌生人，醒来时发现彼此是相亲相爱的。

txt_en: When you're down and out, remember to keep your head up. When you're up and well, remember to keep your feet down.
txt_cn: 穷困潦倒时，要抬头挺胸；春风得意时，要脚踏实地。

txt_en: Accept what was and what is, and you’ll have more positive energy to pursue what will be.
txt_cn: 接受过去和现在的模样，才会有能量去追寻自己的未来。

txt_en: We all have moments of desperation. But if we can face them head on, that’s when we find out just how strong we really are.
txt_cn: 我们都有绝望的时候，只有在勇敢面对时，我们才知道我们有多坚强。

txt_en: Maybe the places that have not been to have been called far away, the people who don't be have are more memorable.
txt_cn: 大概没去过的地方都叫远方，没得到的人都比较难忘。

txt_en: Every loser knows the ways to succeed, but only the successful ones really carry them out persistently.
txt_cn: 每个失败者都知道成功的方法，只有成功者是按照方法坚持去做。 ​​​​

txt_en: When you rise in life, your friend knows who you are. When you fall down, you know who are your friends.
txt_cn: 当你步步高升时，你的朋友知道你是谁；当你每况愈下时，你会知道谁是你的朋友。 ​​​

txt_en: I truly beg you that you can believe how special you are and love who you really love, do what you should do, follow your heart without caring about practical gains or loss.
txt_cn: 愿你在迷茫时，坚信你的珍贵，爱你所爱，行你所行，听从你心，无问西东。

txt_en: There are both views and traps everywhere in life.Make yourself strong enough to endure impending storms.
txt_cn: 人生处处是风景，也处处是陷阱。努力使自己变得强大起来，当风雨来时才能够抵挡。

txt_en: True friends think about you, worry about you, and tell you when they're worried.
txt_cn: 真正的朋友会为你考虑，会担心你，也会和你倾诉他们的忧愁。

txt_en: Things that make life easier: a parent's hug, a lover's kiss, and a friend's support.
txt_cn: 让生活变得轻松的三样东西：父母的拥抱、恋人的亲吻，以及朋友的支持。

txt_en: Take endeavor as a habit instead of temporary passion.
txt_cn: 把努力当成你的习惯，而不是一时心血来潮。

txt_en: Hold fast to your dreams and you can soar even without wings.
txt_cn: 坚持自己的梦想，即使没有翅膀也能飞翔。

txt_en: Love is hard, but the reason I still persist is you.
txt_cn: 爱情很难，因为是你，所以再难我都坚持到最后。

txt_en: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
txt_cn: 真正的朋友绝不会阻挡你的道路，除非你在走下坡路。

txt_en: Life is too short to waste on disappointments. If it is not the end, please smile and go straight ahead.
txt_cn: 生命太短，没时间留给遗憾。若不是终点，请微笑一直向前。

txt_en: Only if the first sign of life, you said I was a piece of pure time, I accompany you to see.
txt_cn: 人生若只如初见，你衔我一片纯白岁月，我陪你看细水长流。

txt_en: Our growth depends not on how many experiences we devour, but on how many we digest.
txt_cn: 囫囵吞枣的人生不是成长，成长是对过往经历的的细细品味领会。

txt_en: You must strive to find your own voice. Because the longer you wait to begin, the less likely you are to find it at all.
txt_cn: 你必须努力去寻找自己的声音，因为你越迟开始寻找，找到的可能性越小。

txt_en: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
txt_cn: 最痛苦的事情是， 在太爱一个人的过程中丧失了自我，忘记了自己也很特别。

txt_en: Home is a place you grow up wanting to leave, and grow old wanting to get back to.
txt_cn: 家是一个你年轻时想离开，年纪大了又想要回归的地方。

txt_en: Sometimes you will never know the true value of a moment until it becomes a memory.
txt_cn: 有时候，直到一些珍贵的时刻成为了回忆，你才会真正意识到它的价值所在。

txt_en: Do not, for one repulse, forgo the purpose that you resolved to effort.
txt_cn: 不要只因一次挫败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的目的。

txt_en: When you finally go back to your old home, you find it wasn't the old home you missed but your childhood.
txt_cn: 时隔多年，你终于回到故乡，这才发现你想念的不是这个地方，而是你的童年。

txt_en: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
txt_cn: 没有人可以回到过去从头再来，但是每个人都可以从今天开始，创造一个全新的结局。

txt_en: The grand essentials of happiness are: something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
txt_cn: 获取幸福最重要的是：有所为，有所爱，有所期待。

txt_en: Being single means that you are strong enough and patient to wait for the one who deserves you.
txt_cn: 单身意味着你足够坚强，有足够的耐心去等待值得拥有你的那个人。

txt_en: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
txt_cn: 享受生活才是最重要的，要快乐，这样就够了。

txt_en: New Year is about getting another chance. A chance to forgive, to do better, to give more, to love more.Happy New Year！
txt_cn: 新年是给我们一个新的机会去原谅，去进步，去给予更多，去爱得更多。 ​​​​新年快乐！

txt_en: When you find real friends, hold on to them, treasure them, spend time with them, be kind to them, love them.
txt_cn: 当找到真正的朋友时，得好好的把握住他们，珍惜他们，和他们共度美好时光，真心对他们，爱他们。 ​​​​

txt_en: Other things may change us, but we start and end with family. So, the love of a family is life's greatest blessing.
txt_cn: 有很多别的事情会改变我们，然而我们源于家庭，归于家庭。因此，家人的爱是生命中最大的福分。

txt_en: Everybody wants happiness. No one wants pain. But how can you make a rainbow without a little rain?
txt_cn: 人人都想要幸福，却不愿承受痛苦。可不经历风雨，怎能见彩虹？

txt_en: Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, but falling in love with you was beyond my control.
txt_cn: 遇见你是命运的安排，成为了朋友是我的选择，而爱上你是我无法控制的意外。 ​​​​

txt_en: Where we love is home, home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
txt_cn: 家，是爱之所在。也许我们脚步渐远，但心从未离开。

txt_en: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
txt_cn: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。

txt_en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting. It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
txt_cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

txt_en: If you want love, then this is it. This is real life. It's not perfect but it's real.
txt_cn: 如果你想要爱情，这就是爱。现实生活就是如此，它不完美，但千真万确。

txt_en: It doesn't matter if you win by an inch or a mile. Winning's winning.
txt_cn: 不管你赢了一寸还是一里，赢了就是赢了。

txt_en: Making a million friends is not a miracle. The miracle is to make  a friend who will stand by you when millions are against you.
txt_cn: 交许许多多的朋友不是什么奇迹，真正的奇迹是当所有人都弃你而去的时候，还有一个朋友坚定的站在你这一边。

txt_en: Promises are often like the butterfly, which disappear after beautiful hover.
txt_cn: 承诺常常很像蝴蝶，美丽的盘旋后就不见了。

txt_en: Fading is true while flowering is past.
txt_cn: 凋谢是真实的，盛开只是一种过去。

txt_en: Some things are not  to see to insist, but insisted the will sees hope.
txt_cn: 有些事情不是看到希望才去坚持，而是坚持了才会看到希望。

txt_en: Home is not where you live but where they understand you.
txt_cn: 栖身之所不一定是家，有人懂你之处才是家。

txt_en: True friends will always find a way to help you. Fake friends will always find an excuse.
txt_cn: 真心朋友总会找机会帮你，假意朋友总会找借口不帮。 ​​​​

txt_en: I don't let myself down, because I have met you in my most gorgeous age.
txt_cn: 能够在最美的时光和你相遇，才算没有辜负自己。

txt_en: Don't be afraid of the darkness. Don't be afraid to chase your dreams. Don't be afraid to be yourself. Follow your own path.
txt_cn: 不要害怕黑暗，不要害怕追寻自己的梦想，不要害怕做与众不同的自己，走你自己的路。

txt_en: True love is not the temporary likeness, and I know it's the feeling—meeting you is hard and it will be a pity if I miss you.
txt_cn: 真正的爱情不是一时好感，而是我知道遇到你不容易，错过了会很可惜。

txt_en: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.
txt_cn: 面对敌人需要勇气，但敢于直面朋友，需要更大的勇气。

txt_en: Falling in love with yourself first doesn’t make you vain or selfish, it makes you indestructible.
txt_cn: 先爱自己不会让你变得无用或自私，它会让你无坚不摧。

txt_en: Love is putting someone else's needs before yours.
txt_cn: 爱，就是把那个人的需要，看得比自己还重要。

txt_en: Water can carve its way, even through stone. And when trapped, water makes a new path.
txt_cn: 水滴能穿石，即便困于一隅，也能另辟蹊径。

txt_en: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
txt_cn: 真正的朋友是‘全世界与我为敌，他与全世界为敌’。

txt_en: Life is not always what we want it to be. We fight. We cry. And sometimes, we give up. But there is always hope in our heart.
txt_cn: 生活有时不尽如人意。我们挣扎、哭泣，有时甚至放弃。但内心始终充满希望。

txt_en: I know someone in the world is waiting for me, although I've no idea of who he is. But I feel happy every day for this.
txt_cn: 我知道这世上有人在等我，尽管我不知道我在等谁。但是因为这样，我每天都非常快乐。

txt_en: Every soil,where he is well,is to a valiant man his natural country.
txt_cn: 勇敢的人随遇而安, 所到之处都是故乡。

txt_en: Look up at the stars, not down at your feet.
txt_cn: 请仰望星空，而不要俯视脚下。

txt_en: Sometimes people don't need advice, they just need someone to listen and care.
txt_cn: 有时候人们需要的不是建议，而是能有一个人来倾听和关心自己。

txt_en: Don't push your friends into your stuff, let them find it and like it if they want to.
txt_cn: 不要强迫你的朋友尝试去爱你所爱的，除非他们自已愿意。

txt_en: If you truly take care of your heart, you will be amazed at how much girls start lining up at your front door.
txt_cn: 如果你真的照顾好自己的心，你会惊讶的发现，不知有多少那样的姑娘在你门前排长队。

txt_en: We used to look up at the sky and wonder at our place in the stars, now we just look down and worry about our place in the dirt.
txt_cn: 我们曾经仰望星空，思考我们在宇宙中的位置，而现在我们只会低着头，担心如何在这片土地上活下去。

txt_en: We take a minute to have a crush on someone but a lifetime to forget someone.
txt_cn: 我们会用一分钟的时间去迷恋一个人却用一辈子的时间去忘记一个人。

txt_en: Destiny is something we've invented because we can't stand the fact that everything that happens is accidental.
txt_cn: 所谓命运不过是托辞，因为我们无法忍受所有事情发生都是偶然的事实。

txt_en: Don't walk in front of me, I may not follow. Don't walk behind me, I may not lead.  Walk beside me, just be my friend.
txt_cn: 不要走在我前面，我可能追不上你 ；不要走在我后面，我可能不会引路；走在我旁边，做我的朋友就好。

txt_en: It is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.
txt_cn: 平凡人也能够选择做到不平凡。

txt_en: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly. What's essential is invisible to the eyes.
txt_cn: 一个人只有用心去看，才能看到真实。事情的真相只用眼睛是看不见的。

txt_en: There will always be prettier and uglier people than you. Accept it and move on.
txt_cn: 在这个世界上，多得是比你丑和比你美的人。所以，不必纠结太多，勇往前行。

txt_en: I don't know if we each have a destiny, or if we're all just floating around accident alike on a breeze.
txt_cn: 我不懂，是我们有着各自不同的命运，还是，我们只不过都是在风中，茫然飘荡。

txt_en: We laughed and kept saying 'see u soon', but inside we both knew we'd never see each other again.
txt_cn: 我们笑着说再见，却深知再见遥遥无期。

txt_en: Be kind, for everyone is fighting a hard battle. And if you really wanna see what people are, all you have to do is look.
txt_cn: 善良一点，因为大家的一生都不容易。如果你想真正了解他人，你需要用心去看。

txt_en: Things that are hard to say, are usually the most important.
txt_cn: 最重要的事往往最难说出口。

txt_en: Sometimes, the silence seemed to connect us in a way that words never could.
txt_cn: 有时候沉默对我们而言胜过千言万语。

txt_en: Save some time to be lazy, it's good for you.
txt_cn: 偶尔赖赖床，没什么不好。

txt_en: Never lie to someone who trust you. Never trust someone who lies to you.
txt_cn: 不要欺骗任何相信你的人，不要相信任何欺骗你的人。

txt_en: It is not crowded on the way up. It is crowded where many people choose to stay within the comfort zone.
txt_cn: 向上的路，并不拥挤。拥挤是因为，大部分人选择了安逸。

txt_en: Many people live a tangled life, for they want to gain others' recognition, but unable to polish themselves peacefully.
txt_cn: 很多人之所以活得纠结，是因为既想得到别人的认可，却又无法静下心来提升自己！

txt_en: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.
txt_cn: 在差异中寻求彼此的共同点,这就是爱。

txt_en: Remember me before the memory of the love disappears.
txt_cn: 在爱的记忆消失以前，请记住我。

txt_en: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
txt_cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

txt_en: Do not look back and grieve over the past, for it’s gone. Live in the present, and make it so beautiful that it will be worth remembering.
txt_cn: 耽溺回忆不如活在当下，让此刻成为未来荣耀之日。

txt_en: The more you fear to change and lose, the more likely you  will lose it without changing yourself.
txt_cn: 你越是害怕去改变和失去，就越容易因不思进取而一无所有。

txt_en: When I saw you I fell in love. And you smiled because you knew.
txt_cn: 看到你的那一刻，我爱上了你。你微笑，因为你知道。

txt_en: The minute you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
txt_cn: 在你想要放弃的那一刻，想想为什么当初坚持走到了这里。

txt_en: In music one must think with the heart and feel with the brains.
txt_cn: 音乐要用心灵去听， 用头脑去感觉。

txt_en: Sometimes there is no next time, no time-outs, no second chances; sometimes it's now or never.
txt_cn: 有时候，真的没有下一次，没有暂停继续，没有机会重来。有时候，错过了就永远没机会了。

txt_en: The furthest distance in the world is not between life and death. But when I stand in front of you, yet you don't know that I love you.
txt_cn: 世界上最遥远的距离不是生与死，而是我就站在你面前，你却不知道我爱你。

txt_en: The more we love our friends, the less we flatter them.
txt_cn: 对朋友爱得越深, 奉承得就越少。

txt_en: There's a kind of poverty called short-sightedness.
txt_cn: 有一种“贫穷”叫短视。

txt_en: Time is a self proclaimed quack which can cure all diseases.
txt_cn: 时间只是一个自称能包治百病的庸医。

txt_en: True victory was lasting peace, not war.
txt_cn: 真正的胜利是持久的和平，而不是战争。

txt_en: The business of life is the acquisition of memories. In the end that's all there is.
txt_cn: 人生就是不断收集回忆的过程，最终能陪伴我们的，也只有回忆了。

txt_en: Love is when you sit beside someone doing nothing yet you feel perfectly happy.
txt_cn: 爱就是当你坐在他身边，哪怕什么都不做，也会感觉很开心。

txt_en: Only the brave man know how to tolerant. Coward never tolerant, it is not his nature.
txt_cn: 只有勇敢的人才懂得如何宽容；懦夫绝不会宽容，这不是他的本性。

txt_en: Spring breeze miles, less than to meet you; Clear blue skies, not as good as you are in my heart. ​​​​
txt_cn: 春风十里，不及相遇有你； 晴空万里，不及心中有你。

txt_en: Things have a way of working out when you least expect it. Never give it up.
txt_cn: 事情总是在你最不抱期望的时候得到解决，所以，永远不要放弃。

txt_en: Love means never having to say you’re sorry.
txt_cn: 爱意味着永远不必说抱歉。

txt_en: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, it is our choices.
txt_cn: 让我们成为什么样的人，并不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择。

txt_en: Here comes a point when a reasonable man will swallow his pride and admit that he's made a terrible mistake.
txt_cn: 懂道理的人，终会有放下自尊、坦承他犯下严重错误的时刻。

txt_en: If life is divided by two,the former is "no hesitation" and the latter is "no regret".
txt_cn: 若将人生一分为二，前半段叫做 “不犹豫”，后半段叫做 “不后悔”。

txt_en: The night opens the flowers in secret and allows the day to get thanks.
txt_cn: 黑夜默默地绽放花儿，把赞美留给白昼。

txt_en: We are made to persist. That's how we find out who we are.
txt_cn: 我们生来就是为了坚持，这样我们才能明白自己是谁。

txt_en: It's important to be with someone who gives you comfort, because love fades, but companionship stays.
txt_cn: 重要的是，要选择一个让自己自在的人，因为两个人可能不再缠绵悱恻，却会相守一生。

txt_en: When you choose to be a sunny, happy person, a rainstorm becomes just another excuse to dance.
txt_cn: 一旦选择做一个阳光，快乐的人，那风雨也只会是让你起舞的理由。

txt_en: Nothing is to be got without pains but poverty.
txt_cn: 世上唯有贫穷可以不劳而获。

txt_en: Don’t be concerned with the distance of the journey. Every new step provides a new view; every new destination creates new joy.
txt_cn: 怕什么路途遥远。走一步有一步的风景，进一步有一步的欢喜。

txt_en: God is always playing tricks on people, arranging them to meet but then to separate.
txt_cn: 老天总是捉弄人，安排了相遇，却又策划了分离。

txt_en: Life isn’t always perfect. Life isn’t always easy. Life doesn’t always make sense. But that’s the beauty of life.
txt_cn: 生活不总是完美无缺，轻而易举或者合情合理。但这就是生活的美好之所在。

txt_en: Tears are words from the heart that can't be spoken.
txt_cn: 眼泪是来自心底却说不出口的话。

txt_en: You are not ordinary, you are born to stand out.
txt_cn: 你天生与众不同,注定不会被淹没在人群中。

txt_en: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
txt_cn: 身在井隅，心向璀璨。

txt_en: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.
txt_cn: 勇气是一切美德攀登的阶梯。

txt_en: The longest way must have its close;the gloomiest night will wear on to a morning.
txt_cn: 最长的路也有尽头，最黑暗的夜晚也会迎接清晨。

txt_en: It is no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
txt_cn: 回到昨天毫无用处，因为今天的我和过去有所不同。

txt_en: Time can heal a broken heart, but it can also break a waiting heart.
txt_cn: 时间可以治愈一颗受伤的心，同样也可以撕裂一颗等待的心。

txt_en: As long as we have memories, yesterday remains. As long as we have hopes, tomorrow awaits.
txt_cn: 只要我们还有回忆，昨日仍在。只要我们还有希望，明日尚待。

txt_en: Knowledge is a city to the building of which every human being brought  a stone.
txt_cn: 知识是一座城堡，每个人都应为它增砖添瓦。

txt_en: A strong man will struggle with the storms of fate.
txt_cn: 强者能同命运的风暴抗争。

txt_en: A man is not old as long as he is seeking something. A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
txt_cn: 只要一个人还有追求，他就没有老。直到后悔取代了梦想，一个人才算老。

txt_en: When you feel like hope is gone, look inside you and search your soul. You will find a hero lies in you.
txt_cn: 当你感觉希望不在的时候，看一下自己的内心世界，探寻一下自己的灵魂，你会在你心中找到一个英雄。

txt_en: Life has taught us that love does not consist in gazing at each other but in looking outward together in the same direction.
txt_cn: 爱不是从相互凝视之中获得的，倒是可以由同朝一个方向眺望而产生，这是生活给予我们的教训。

txt_en: Maybe God wants us to meet a few wrong people before meeting the right one, so that when we finally meet the person, we will know how to be grateful.
txt_cn: 在遇到梦中人之前，上天也许会安排我们先遇到别的人，在我们终于遇见心仪的人时，便应当心存感激。

txt_en: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
txt_cn: 我们看起来似乎痛苦的试炼，常常是伪装起来的好运。

txt_en: Love is the only thing that holds the dark at bay.
txt_cn: 唯有爱可以把黑暗囚在波港湾里。

txt_en: I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday and love today.
txt_cn: 我不害怕明天，因为我经历过昨天，又热爱今天。

txt_en: If I had eight hours to chop down a tree, I would spend six hours sharpening my ax.
txt_cn: 如果我有八小时砍倒一棵树，我会拿六小时来磨斧头。

txt_en: The stars change, but the mind remains the same.
txt_cn: 繁星纵变，但智慧永恒。

txt_en: A friend is one of the nicest things you can have, and one of the best things you can be.
txt_cn: 拥有朋友是最美好的一件事，成为别人的朋友是最美妙的一件事。

txt_en: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
txt_cn: 生活本身就是最美妙的童话故事。

txt_en: Only those who capture the moment are real.
txt_cn: 把握当下才是真。

txt_en: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
txt_cn: 当你想做成一件事情的时候，全宇宙都会帮助你得到它。

txt_en: You cannot do it-that is the biggest lie on earth.
txt_cn: 世界上最大的谎言就是你不行。

txt_en: The meaning of life is not simply to exist, to survive, but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.
txt_cn: 生命的意义不仅在于简单的存在与活着，而是去前行、进步、获取和征服。

txt_en: Success does not consist in never  making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
txt_cn: 成功并不在于从不犯错，而在于不重蹈覆辙。

txt_en: Only the deaf appreciate hearing, only the blind realize the manifold blessings that lie  in sight.
txt_cn: 只有聋子才珍惜听力，只有盲人才能感受到得见光明的喜悦。

txt_en: Childhood is the golden field, the green river, and the colorful pebble beach.
txt_cn: 童年是金色的田野，是青青的小河，是五彩斑斓的卵石滩。

txt_en: Truly, life smells like an onion: You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
txt_cn: 其实，生活就像洋葱，一片一片剥下去，总有一片让你流泪。

txt_en: There are no easy answers, there is only living through the questions.
txt_cn: 生活从来没有容易的答案，只有去克服重重问题。

txt_en: The world always makes way for the dreamer.
txt_cn: 世界总为梦想者让路。

txt_en: If I should meet thee, after long years. How should I greet thee, with silence and tears.
txt_cn: 若我会见到你，事隔经年。我该如何致意，以眼泪，以沉默。

txt_en: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
txt_cn: 走的慢不重要，重要的是你不停止。

txt_en: There is nothing difficult for us to do in the world. If we do it, the difficult thing will be easy; if we do not, the easy thing will be difficult.
txt_cn: 天下事有难易乎？为之，则难者亦易矣；不为，则易者亦难矣。

txt_en: Do not let your dream be dream.
txt_cn: 别让你的梦想只成为梦想。

txt_en: To never forget how much your family loves you.
txt_cn: 永远不要忘记你的家人有多爱你。

txt_en: Happiness is always around us if we put our hearts into life.
txt_cn: 如果我们把我们的心真正投入到生活之中，那么幸福快乐就总是在我们身边。

txt_en: No one is indebted for others, while many people do not know how to cherish others.
txt_cn: 没有谁对不起谁，只有谁不懂得珍惜谁。

txt_en: Everyone is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
txt_cn: 每个人都是天才。但如果硬要以鱼儿爬树的本领，来评估它的能力，它这辈子都会觉得自己是条蠢鱼。

txt_en: We are here to put a dent in the universe.
txt_cn: 活着就是为了改变世界。

txt_en: With great power there must come great responsibility.
txt_cn: 有多大能力就会有多大责任。

txt_en: There is no solace above or below. Only us... Small, solitary, battling one another. I pray to myself, for myself.
txt_cn: 天堂地狱都没法给你慰藉，只有我们自己：渺小，孤独，奋斗，与彼此抗争。我向自己祈祷，为自己祈祷。

txt_en: I am only brave when I have to be. Being brave does not mean you go looking for trouble.
txt_cn: 我只是在必要的时候才会勇敢，勇敢并不代表你要到处闯祸。

txt_en: My father is my hero, all throughout my life.
txt_cn: 我的父亲就是我的英雄，从始至终。

txt_en: If you see something wrong happening in the world, you can either do nothing, or you can do something.
txt_cn: 如果你看到这个世界出了问题，你要么别插手，要么去改变她。

txt_en: Not everything that counts can be counted, and not everything that's counted truly counts.
txt_cn: 不是所有有价值的事物都可以被计算，也不是所有可计算的事物都值得去计算。

txt_en: A pearl is a temple built by pain around a grain of sand.
txt_cn: 一粒珍珠，是痛苦围绕着一粒沙子所建造起来的庙宇。

txt_en: I will send you all my love everyday in a letter sealed with a kiss.
txt_cn: 我将每天把我的爱情，装进以吻封缄的信封里送给你。

txt_en: If you don't go for a walk, you'll think this is the world.
txt_cn: 如果你不出去走走，你就会以为这就是全世界。

txt_en: You lost the people you love and you have to find a way to go on. Then let it go and say goodbye with a smile. Although it won't be easy.
txt_cn: 失去深爱的人，我们仍要学会好好的生活。学着放手，微笑着道别，尽管这并不容易。

txt_en: I have found it worth living, and would gladly live it again if the chance were offered me.
txt_cn: 我发现人是值得活的。若再给我一次生命，我将欣然接受这难得的赐予。

txt_en: No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin. They can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart.
txt_cn: 没有人生来就因为肤色去憎恨别人。每个人都可以学会去爱，因为爱自在人心。

txt_en: If you missed the train I'm on, you will know that I am gone, you can hear the whistle blow a hundred miles.
txt_cn: 如果你错过我坐的这趟火车，你就该明白我已离去，你可以听见一百里外飘来的汽笛声。

txt_en: Doing what you like is freedom, liking what you do is happiness.
txt_cn: 自由是做你自己喜欢的事，而幸福却是喜欢你自己做的事。

txt_en: You may lose faith with us, but never with yourself.
txt_cn: 你也许会对我们失去信心，但永远不要对你自己失去信心。

txt_en: It's just a game, so go and play.
txt_cn: 那只是一场比赛，重要的是永不低头。

txt_en: As long as we're running, as long as we don't stop, who knows what's going on ahead?
txt_cn: 只要我们还在跑，只要我们始终不停下来，谁又知道前方会发生什么呢？

txt_en: If you have faith, you can do anything.
txt_cn: 坚信的，总会成功。

txt_en: Ordinary steps can also take a great trip.
txt_cn: 平凡的脚步也可以走完伟大的行程。

txt_en: A person's character is not determined by how he or she enjoys victory, but rather how he or she endures defeat.
txt_cn: 一个人的人格不取决于他如何享受胜利，而在于这个人如何忍受失败。

txt_en: If by life you were deceived, don't be dismal, don't be wild! In the day of grief, be mild. Merry days will come, believe.
txt_cn: 假如生活欺骗了你，不要悲伤，不要心急！忧郁的日子里须要镇静：相信吧，快乐的日子将会来临！

txt_en: This kind of certainty comes just once in a lifetime.
txt_cn: 这样确信无疑的爱，一生只此一次。

txt_en: There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.
txt_cn: 世上没有绝对的善与恶，差别只在于强者和无法分清事实的弱者。

txt_en: Man was born free, and everywhere he is in chains.
txt_cn: 人是生而自由的，却处处受到束缚。

txt_en: People are always writing things about me. It is up to them, for me it is not a problem. I will just try to play well and do my best. I am just focused on playing good football.
txt_cn: 人们总是会写一些我的事情。这是他们的事，对我来说，我只需要尽最大努力踢好球。把球踢好就足够了。

txt_en: I love three things in the world: the sun, the moon, and you. The sun for day, the moon for night, and you forever.
txt_cn: 吾独爱世间三物：昼之日，夜之月，汝之永恒。

txt_en: The more you study, the more you will find yourself ignorant.
txt_cn: 学，然后知不足。

txt_en: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
txt_cn: 林子里有两条路，我选择了行人稀少的那一条，它改变了我的一生。

txt_en: We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
txt_cn: 信念坚定，如虎添翼。

txt_en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal. It is the courage to continue that counts.
txt_cn: 成功并不是终点，失败也不会致命，真正重要的是继续走下去的勇气。

txt_en: Thoreau said: most men lead lives of quiet desperation.
txt_cn: 梭罗说：“大多数人都生活在平静的绝望中。”

txt_en: Positive people are lucky people, they can see the roses while others see only the thorns.
txt_cn: 积极的人是幸运的人，当别人只看到刺的时候，他们却可以看到玫瑰。

txt_en: Memory is a kind of want to see, and forgetting is a form of relief.
txt_cn: 记忆是一种相见的形式，忘却是一种解脱的方式。

txt_en: No matter what situation we face, no matter how contradictory our hearts are, we always have a choice. What kind of person we are depends on who we choose to be.
txt_cn: 不管我们面对什么处境，不管我们的内心多么矛盾，我们总有选择。我们是什么样的人，取决于我们选择做什么样的人。

txt_en: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding. Pursue your object, be it what it will, steadily and indefatigable.
txt_cn: 人生的目标是唯一值得发现的财富。追求你的目标，无论它是什么，都将是稳定和不屈不挠的。

txt_en: Human life is like flowing water, only when it hits isles and reefs can it create beautiful waves.
txt_cn: 人的生命，似洪水奔流，不遇岛屿和暗礁，难以激起美丽的浪花。

txt_en: There is nothing noble in being superior to some other man. The true nobility is in being superior to your previous self.
txt_cn: 优于别人，并不高贵。真正的高贵应该是优于过去的自己。

txt_en: Life means progress, and progress means suffering.
txt_cn: 生活意味着进步，进步意味着受苦。

txt_en: Nothing is impossible when you believe in yourself.
txt_cn: 只要相信你自己，就没有什么不可能。

txt_en: Nobody sees a flower really, it is so small. We haven't time, and to see takes time - like to have a friend takes time.
txt_cn: 没有人真正看过一朵花，花那么小。我们又没有时间，看花可是要花时间的，就像交朋友也要花时间。

txt_en: You can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
txt_cn: 如果你不能飞，那就跑；如果跑不动，那就走；实在走不了，那就爬。无论怎样，你都要勇往直前。

txt_en: With equal passion I have sought knowledge. I have wished to understand the hearts of men. I have wished to know why the stars shine.
txt_cn: 我用同样的激情去寻求知识。我希望能理解人类的心灵，希望能够知道群星为何闪烁。

txt_en: I always knew looking back on the tears would make me laugh, but I never knew looking back on the laughs would make me cry.
txt_cn: 我知道再回首时，那些眼泪想来可笑；却不知再回眸时，那些欢声笑语也能叫我潸然泪下。

txt_en: Give me your best shot. I'm not gonna give up, I will never give in.
txt_cn: 你最好给我狠狠的一击，但是我绝不会因此放弃，也绝不可能屈服。

txt_en: Some men see things as they are and say, why. I dream things that never were and say, why not.
txt_cn: 有些人只能看到已有的事物，然后只会问为什么会这样？我梦想那些从来没有的事情，然后问为什么不那样？

txt_en: It turns out I don't need a medal to tell me I'm a good guy. Because of that kid likes me. How bad can I be.
txt_cn: 其实我不需要一个勋章开证明我是个好人，如果连那样的小女孩都喜欢我，我能坏到哪儿去呢？

txt_en: In me the tiger sniffes the rose, after the feast bursts the tear.
txt_cn: 心如猛虎，细嗅蔷薇；盛宴过后，泪流满面。

txt_en: Why do we fall? So we can learn to pick ourselves up.
txt_cn: 我们为什么会跌倒？因为这样才能学会站起来！

txt_en: No matter how hard we try to be mature, we will always be a kid when we all get hurt and cry.
txt_cn: 不管多努力蜕变成熟，一旦受伤哭泣时，我们还是像个孩子。

txt_en: I am just a sunflower, waiting for my only sunshine.
txt_cn: 我只是一株向日葵，期待着属于自己的那缕阳光。

txt_en: Better to have loved and lost, than never to have loved at all.
txt_cn: 只求曾经拥有，不求天长地久。

txt_en: Burdens are for shoulders strong enough to carry them.
txt_cn: 沉重的担子是由那些有着坚强的肩膀的人来挑的。

txt_en: When I was young, I wanted to be anybody but myself. I would have to accept myself, my warts and all.
txt_cn: 当我年轻的时候，我想成为除我之外的任何人。但我必须接受我自己，我的缺点，我的一切。

txt_en: Human life is like flowing water, only when it hits isles and reefs can it create beautiful waves.
txt_cn: 人的生命，似洪水奔流，不遇岛屿和暗礁，难以激起美丽的浪花。

txt_en: Don't give up when you still have something to give, nothing is really over until the moment you stop trying.
txt_cn: 当你还能付出时不要放弃，任何事都不会真正结束直到你停止努力的那一刻。

txt_en: You don't get to choose if you get hurt in this world, but you do have a say in who hurts you.
txt_cn: 你无从选择在世上是否会受到伤害，但你能选择谁来伤害你。

txt_en: So dawn goes down to day, nothing gold can stay.
txt_cn: 破晓黎明延续至晃晃白昼，宝贵如金也难以保留。

txt_en: People should not be inserted lives in the vase for people to watch, but spread on the prairie wind dance rhythm.
txt_cn: 人不应该是插在花瓶里供人观赏的静物，而是蔓延在草原上随风起舞的韵律。

txt_en: To err is human, to forgive is divine.
txt_cn: 人非圣贤，孰能无过。

txt_en: Since I have chosen to go far, I will just walk down the path I have chosen step by step.
txt_cn: 既然选择了远方，便只顾风雨兼程。

txt_en: I don't know the reason why I love you, but I know you are the reason why I don't love others.
txt_cn: 我不知道我爱你的理由是什么，但我知道你是我不爱其他人的理由。

txt_en: I love the broken sound in my body and the healing process.
txt_cn: 我喜欢我身体破碎的声音和不断愈合的过程。

txt_en: The beauty of white paper is that you can paint a map of your life as you please.
txt_cn: 白纸的美好在于：你可以随心所欲地描绘你的人生地图。

txt_en: Let's leave the world behind. Take me through the night. Fall into the dark side.
txt_cn: 让我们离开人寰，去更遥远的未来，带我穿越漆黑的夜空，坠入那无边的黑暗。

txt_en: Unable to perceive the shape of you, I find you all around me. Your presence fills my eyes with your love, it humbles my heart. For you are everywhere.
txt_cn: 无法描述你的形状，我感觉到你包围着我。因为你的存在，我满眼都是爱意。我的心变得柔软，只因你无处不在。

txt_en: But know this: the ones that love us never really leave us. And you can always find them in heart.
txt_cn: 要记住：爱我们的人永远不会真正离开我们。他们一直在你身边陪伴着你，在心里。

txt_en: Aspire to inspire until I expire.
txt_cn: 生命不息，奋斗不止。

txt_en: Make you tired of the mountain is not far away, but a grain of sand in my shoes.
txt_cn: 使人疲惫的不是远方的高山，而是鞋里的一粒沙子。

txt_en: The flowers are similar every year, but people are different from year to year.
txt_cn: 年年岁岁花相似，岁岁年年人不同。

txt_en: Be an especially simple person, do not expect good luck coming suddenly, manage yourself well and cherish time at the moment.
txt_cn: 做一个特别简单的人，不期待突如其来的好运，经营好自己，珍惜眼前的时光！

txt_en: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
txt_cn: 生活有两种方式：一种是没有奇迹发生；另一种则是到处是奇迹。

txt_en: Don't let yourself get busy all day and end up doing nothing.
txt_cn: 不要让自己一天忙忙碌碌，最终却碌碌无为。

txt_en: Why are you trying so hard to fit in when you were born to stand out?
txt_cn: 如果你生来就与众不同，何苦非要融入这群乌合之众？

txt_en: What really makes you backward is not the difficulty in front, but the way back.
txt_cn: 真正让你后退的，不是前面的困难，而是后面的退路。

txt_en: You will always be able to make more money, but you cannot make more time.
txt_cn: 你可以赚取很多的钱，但是你不能赢得更多的时间。

txt_en: Individual commitment to a group effort – that’s what makes a team  work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
txt_cn: 个人对集体努力的承诺，它造就团队合作、公司运作、社会协作，文明工作。

txt_en: Books are the mirrors of the soul.
txt_cn: 书籍是灵魂的镜子。

txt_en: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the one we miss.
txt_cn: 我们的生活是由机遇所界定的，甚至是那些我们错失的机遇。

txt_en: If you are alone, why not seek the company of books?
txt_cn: 找不到朋友时，为什么不翻翻书呢？

txt_en: The rational and the irrational complement each other. Individually, they are far less powerful.
txt_cn: 理性和非理性是互补的。两者分开的话，力量就会小很多。

txt_en: Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure.
txt_cn: 我们最深的恐惧是我们的力量无可估量。

txt_en: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
txt_cn: 我想像不出，在孩提时代，还有什么需要会像渴求父亲保护一样强烈。

txt_en: Having a calm smile to face with being disdained indicates kind of confidence.
txt_cn: 被轻蔑的时候能平静一笑，这是一种自信。

txt_en: For we are lovers of the beautiful,yet simple in our tastes; and we cultivate the mind without loss of manliness.
txt_cn: 我们是美之爱好者，但我们的趣味是淡雅的；我们陶冶性灵，但我们也不让失却丈夫气。

txt_en: One who frequently looks back can't go far.
txt_cn: 一个频频回头的人，是走不了远路的。

txt_en: One is always on a strange road, watching strange scenery and listening to strange music. Then one day, you will find that the things you try hard to forget are already gone.
txt_cn: 一个人总要走陌生的路，看陌生的风景，听陌生的歌。总有一天，在某个不经意的瞬间，你会发现，曾经努力想要忘记的事情早已消逝。

txt_en: I may not be able to change the past, but I can learn from it.
txt_cn: 我也许不能改变过去，但我能从中学习。

txt_en: It's an amazing feeling to realize how one person who was once just a stranger suddenly meant the world to you.
txt_cn: 很奇妙的一种感觉是：曾经的陌生人，突然之间成为了你的整个世界。

txt_en: The aim of education should be to convert the mind into living fountain, and not a reservoir.
txt_cn: 教育的目的应是把人心转化为活的泉水，而不是贮水池。

txt_en: The best of all ways to strengthen our days is to steal hours from the night.
txt_cn: 延长白天最好的办法，就是从夜晚偷时间。

txt_en: Time is but a river flowing from our past.
txt_cn: 岁月不过是一条长河，从你我的过往穿流而过。

txt_en: We are still kids but we are so in love, fighting against all odds.
txt_cn: 我们虽然年少，但却如此相爱。让我们披荆斩棘，跨越所有障碍。

txt_en: Anywhere I see suffering, that is where I want to be, doing what I can.
txt_cn: 每一个遭受痛苦的地方就是我要去的地方，做任何我能做到的事。

txt_en: A foreign language is a weapon in the struggle of life.
txt_cn: 一门外语是人生之奋斗中的强大武器。

txt_en: I never really noticed that I had to decide, to play someone's game or live my own life.
txt_cn: 我从未真正意识到我该抉择的是：活在别人的剧本还是叙写自己的人生。

txt_en: Count your age by friends, not years; Count your life by smiles, not tears.
txt_cn: 以友情计岁月，而非年龄；以笑容量人生，而非泪水。

txt_en: May you not be lonely but be able to enjoy being alone.
txt_cn: 愿你不再孤单，并学会享受孤独。

txt_en: As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.
txt_cn: 只要一息尚存，就不得不战。

txt_en: Don't ever let somebody tell you you can't do something, not even me.
txt_cn: 永远别让旁人说你成不了事，就算是我也不行。

txt_en: You cannot live your life to please others. The choice must be yours.
txt_cn: 你不能为取悦别人而活，你得有自己的选择。

txt_en: It is the time you have wasted for your rose that makes your rose so important.
txt_cn: 正因为你为你的玫瑰花费了时间，这才使你的玫瑰变得如此重要。

txt_en: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
txt_cn: 患难见真情。

txt_en: The moon becomes round, which indicates the reunion of people.
txt_cn: 月之圆，兆人之团圆。

txt_en: Life is too short to miss out anything, try to take it slowly.
txt_cn: 生命短暂，放慢脚步，别错过任何沿途的风景。

txt_en: If at first you don't succeed, then dust yourself off and try again.
txt_cn: 失败了没关系，重振旗鼓，从头再来。

txt_en: With the right kind of coaching and determination you can accomplish anything.
txt_cn: 正确的训练加上坚定的决心，你将攻无不克。

txt_en: We all make choices, but in the end our choices make us.
txt_cn: 我们都要做很多选择，最终这些选择创造了我们。

txt_en: If your eyes are opened, you will see the things worth seeing.
txt_cn: 如果你睁开眼睛，你会看到值得看的东西。

txt_en: Some of us get dipped in flat, some in satin, some in gloss. But every once in a while you find someone who's iridescent, and when you do, nothing will ever compare.
txt_cn: 有些人沦为平庸浅薄，金玉其外，败絮其中。可不经意间你会遇到一个彩虹般的人，从此以后，其他人不过是匆匆浮云。

txt_en: A man has free choice to begin love, but not to end it.
txt_cn: 一个人可以选择爱上谁，当他要结束爱情时，他是没有选择的。

txt_en: There are more things in heaven and earth than you've ever dream of.
txt_cn: 天地之大，比你所能梦想到的更多。

txt_en: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
txt_cn: 不要把秘密传给风，风会传遍整个森林。

txt_en: I would die for you. But I wouldn't live for you.
txt_cn: 我愿意为你赴死，但不会指望你而活。

txt_en: There are no easy answers, there's only living through the questions.
txt_cn: 生活从来没有容易的答案，只有去克服重重问题。

txt_en: I can't control their fear, only my own.
txt_cn: 我不能掌控他人的恐惧，只能掌控自己的。

txt_en: The longest day has an end.
txt_cn: 最难过的日子也有尽头。

txt_en: Sometimes it's hard to accept the truth because the lies sound so much better.
txt_cn: 真相有时之所以难以被接受，是因为谎言听起来美好多了。

txt_en: It does not do well to depend on dreams and forget to live, remember that.
txt_cn: 记住：不要依赖梦想而忘记生活。

txt_en: We laughed and kept saying see you soon, but inside we both knew we'd never see each other again.
txt_cn: 我们笑着说再见，却深知再见遥遥无期。

txt_en: Had I not seen the sun, I could have borne the shade.
txt_cn: 我本可以忍受黑暗，如果我不曾见过太阳。

txt_en: Sometimes it is the very people who no one imagines anything of who do the things that no one can imagine.
txt_cn: 有时候正是人们以为的无用之人成就无人敢想之事。

txt_en: To really understand a man, we must judge him in misfortune.
txt_cn: 要真正了解一个人，需在不幸中考察他。

txt_en: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
txt_cn: 生活中最大的幸福是坚信有人爱我们。

txt_en: Happiness lies not in the mere possession of money, it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
txt_cn: 幸福不在于拥有金钱，而在于获得成就时的喜悦以及产生创造力的激情。

txt_en: I have failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
txt_cn: 我的一生一次又一次失败过，而那正是我成功的原因。

txt_en: Some of the most successful people in the world are the ones who've had the most failures.
txt_cn: 世上最成功的人往往都是失败最多的人。

txt_en: None is of freedom or of life deserving unless he daily conquers it anew.
txt_cn: 只有每天再度战胜生活并夺取自由的人，才配享受生活和自由。

txt_en: Towering genius disdains a beaten path. It seeks regions hitherto unexplored.
txt_cn: 卓越的天才不屑走旁人走过的路，他寻找迄今未开拓的地区。

txt_en: Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is below even defeat, and is born vanquished.
txt_cn: 只有强者才懂得斗争；弱者甚至失败都不够资格，而是生来就是被征服的。

txt_en: Made it, Ma! Top of the world!
txt_cn: 好好去做吧，站在世界之巅!

txt_en: Time goes by, there is no end, only the intersection.
txt_cn: 时间一直走，没有尽头，只有路口。

txt_en: Everyone you see exists together in a delicate balance.
txt_cn: 世界上所有的生命都在微妙的平衡中生存。

txt_en: But every once in a while you find someone who's iridescent, and when you do, nothing will compare.
txt_cn: 世人万千种，浮云莫去求，斯人如彩虹，遇上方知有。

txt_en: Life doesn't just happen to you; you receive everything in your life based on what you've given.
txt_cn: 发生在你身上的一切均非偶然。你从生活中得到了什么，源于你给予了什么。

txt_en: Night comes, is one of the most vulnerable, when the mind is also thinking of the most crazy time. In fact, a person is not alone miss when a person is really alone.
txt_cn: 深夜来临的时候，是一个人心灵最脆弱的时候，也是思念最疯狂的时候。其实一个人并不孤单，想念一个人的时候才是真正的孤单。

txt_en: Your mind is like this water, my friend, when it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.
txt_cn: 你的思想就如同水，我的朋友，当水波摇曳时，很难看清，不过当它平静下来，答案就清澈见底了。

txt_en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity.
txt_cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。

txt_en: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free. A strong man can save himself. A great man can save another.
txt_cn: 懦怯囚禁人的灵魂，希望可以解救人的自由。强者自救，圣者渡人。

txt_en: The defects and faults of the mind are like wounds in the body. After all imaginable care has been taken to heal them up, still there will be a scar left behind.
txt_cn: 思想上的缺陷和弱点正如身体上的创伤，就算用尽一切办法将其治愈，仍然会留下疤痕。

txt_en: What else is the whole life of mortals but a sort of comedy, in which the various actors, disguised by various costumes and masks, walk on and play each one his part, until the manager waves them off the stage.
txt_cn: 人生如喜剧，人人皆化妆假面，扮演各自角色，直到戏毕离场。

txt_en: The past is our definition. We may strive, with good reason, to escape it or what is bad in it, but we will escape it only by adding things better to it.
txt_cn: 过去是我们给自己下的定义。我们有很好的理由去努力摆脱它，或是摆脱其中不好的部分，但摆脱它的唯一途径是——在其中添加更好的东西。

txt_en: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
txt_cn: 当你发现你想和某个人共度余生时，你会想要余生快点开始。

txt_en: I never look back. It distracts from the now.
txt_cn: 我从来不回头看，因为那样会让我对现在分心。

txt_en: It is not enough to be industrious, so are the ants. What are you industrious for?
txt_cn: 光勤劳是不够的，蚂蚁也是勤劳的。要看你为什么而勤劳。

txt_en: One of the basic rules of the universe is that nothing is perfect. Perfection simply doesn't exist.....Without imperfection, neither you nor I would exist.
txt_cn: 宇宙的基本准则之一：金无足赤，人无完人。这世上不存在所谓的“完美”。没了这种“不完美”，你我将不复存在。

txt_en: Yes, the past can hurt. But I think you can either run from it or learn from it.
txt_cn: 对，过去是痛楚的，但我认为你要么可以逃避，要么可以向它学习。

txt_en: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.
txt_cn: 你玩权利的游戏，结局要么赢、要么死。没有其他选择。

txt_en: A goal is not always meant to be reached, and it often serves simply as something to aim at.
txt_cn: 目标并不一定总是用于去达成的，很多时候它仅仅是为了给你方向感。

txt_en: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
txt_cn: 世界上对勇气的最大考验是忍受失败而不丧失信心。

txt_en: The bigger the man, the deeper his imprint. And if he loves, he suffers, knowing it's a dead-end street.
txt_cn: 越是煎熬，越刻骨铭心，爱了就要受苦，明知没有结果。

txt_en: Sloth, like rust, consumes faster than labor wear.
txt_cn: 懒惰像生锈一样，比操劳更能消耗身体。

txt_en: Don't part with your illusions. When they are gone, you may still exist. But you have ceased to live.
txt_cn: 不要放弃你的幻想。当幻想没有了以后，你还可以生存，但是你虽生犹死。

txt_en: I love waking up in the morning, not knowing what's going to happen, or whom I'm going to meet, where I'm going to wind up.
txt_cn: 我喜欢早上起来时一切都是未知的，不知会遇见什么人，会有什么样的结局。

txt_en: It's not the man in your life that counts but the life in your man.
txt_cn: 有价值的并不是你生命中的男人，而是你与他在一起时的生命。

txt_en: Now I find myself in a world which for me is worse than death. It is a world in which there is no place for me.
txt_cn: 现在我发现自己活在一个比死还痛苦的世界，一个无我容身之处的世界。

txt_en: I don't want to be someone that you're settling for. I don't want to be someone that anyone settles for.
txt_cn: 我不想要你将就，我也不想成为将就的对象。

txt_en: Some love stories aren't epic novels. Some are short stories, but that doesn't make them any less filled with love.
txt_cn: 有些爱情故事不会成为史诗，有些只是短篇小说，但同样都满溢着爱。

txt_en: Love is when you sit beside someone doing nothing yet you feel perfectly happy.
txt_cn: 爱就是当你坐在他身边，哪怕什么都不做，也会感觉很开心。

txt_en: There is not a heart but has its moments of longing, yearning for something better, nobler and holier than it knows before.
txt_cn: 每个人都有向往的时候，渴望比以前更美好，更高贵，更神圣的东西。

txt_en: It is awfully easy to be hard-boiled about everything in the daytime, but at night it is another thing.
txt_cn: 在白天对什么都不动感情是极为容易的，但在夜晚就是另外一回事了。

txt_en: Sometimes people think they lose things and they didn't really lose them. It just gets moved.
txt_cn: 人们有时以为失去了什么，其实没有，只是被移开了。

txt_en: If you are doing your best, you will not have to worry about failure.
txt_cn: 如果你竭尽全力，你就不用担心失败。

txt_en: The world is like a mirror: when you frown at it, it frowns at you; when smile, it smiles too.
txt_cn: 世界犹如一面镜子：朝它皱眉的话，它就朝你皱眉；朝它微笑，它也朝你微笑。

txt_en: Do not, for one repulse, give up the purpose that you resolved to effect.
txt_cn: 不要只因一次失败，就放弃你原来决心想到达的目的。

txt_en: Human felicity is produced not so much by great pieces of good fortune that seldom happen, as by little advantages that occur every day.
txt_cn: 与其说人类的幸福来自偶尔发生的鸿运，不如说来自每天都有的小实惠。

txt_en: We're going where no one has gone before. There is no model to follow, nothing to copy. That is what makes this so exciting.
txt_cn: 我们要去别人从没去过的地方。没有模式可以模仿，没有东西可以复制。这才是魅力所在。

txt_en: You become what you believe. You are where you are today in your life based on everything you have believed.
txt_cn: 你梦想成为什么样的人，你就能成为什么样的人。你今时今日所处的位置都是基于你所信赖和梦想的一切。

txt_en: The weakest link in a chain is the strongest because it can break it.
txt_cn: 在一个链条里，最弱的一环也可能是最强的，因为它可以使整个链条断掉。

txt_en: If you would go high, then use your own legs! Do not let yourselves carried aloft; do not seat yourselves on other people's backs and heads.
txt_cn: 如果你想走到高处，就要用自己的两条腿！不要让别人把你抬到高处；不要坐在别人的背上和头上。

txt_en: Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
txt_cn: 对于大多数人来说，他们认定自己有多幸福，就有多幸福。

txt_en: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, but our choices.
txt_cn: 决定我们成为什么样的人，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择。

txt_en: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
txt_cn: 你的时间有限，所以不要浪费时间去过别人的生活。

txt_en: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
txt_cn: 如果你热爱生活就不要浪费时间，因为时间是生活的组成部分。

txt_en: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
txt_cn: 如果你花费过多的时间去想某件事，那么你将永远也不会完成它。

txt_en: A man may lead a horse to the water, but he cannot make it drink.
txt_cn: 一个人可以把马带到河边，但他不能令它饮水。

txt_en: Life itself, without the assistance of colleges and universities, is becoming an advanced institution of learning.
txt_cn: 没有学院和大学的帮助，人生本身也正在变成一所高等学府。

txt_en: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
txt_cn: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。

txt_en: Do not know how high the sky is until one climbs up the tops of mountains, and do not know how thick the earth is until one comes to the deep river.
txt_cn: 不登高山，不知天之高也；不临深溪，不知天之厚也。

txt_en: Life comes with many challenges. The ones that should not scare us are ones we can take on and take control of.
txt_cn: 生活充满了挑战，唯有勇敢面对并自我掌控，我们才能克服恐惧。

txt_en: The respectability of youth lies in their courage and great expectation.
txt_cn: 年轻人的可敬之处在于勇气和远大前程。

txt_en: The value of life, not with time, but with the depth to be measured.
txt_cn: 人生的价值，并不是用时间，而是用深度去衡量的。

txt_en: You cannot improve your past, but you can improve your future. Once time is wasted, life is wasted.
txt_cn: 你不能改变你的过去，但你可以让你的未来变得更好。一旦时间浪费了，生命就浪费了。

txt_en: The best kind of friend is the kind you can sit on a porch swing with, never say a word, and then walk away feeling like it was the best conversation you've ever had.
txt_cn: 最好的朋友就是那种能和你促膝而坐，彼此不说只言片语，分别时却感到这是你有过的最好的一次交流。

txt_en: Always put yourself in the other's shoes. If you feel that it hurts you, it probably hurts the person too.
txt_cn: 要设身处地地为别人着想，如果一双鞋你穿着夹脚，别人的感觉可能也一样。

txt_en: I will not be afflicted at men's not knowing me; I will be afflicted that I do not know men.
txt_cn: 不患人之不己知，患不知人也。

txt_en: There is a prospect greater than the sea, and it is the sky; there is a prospect greater than the sky, and it is the human soul.
txt_cn: 世界上最宽阔的是海洋，比海洋更宽阔的是天空，比天空更宽阔的是人的胸怀。

txt_en: Swelled heads are so preoccupied with the few things they know, so that there is no room left for the innumerable things they don't know.
txt_cn: 自命不凡者，脑中被其所知的少数事物所占据，以致没有空间去容纳无数其所不知的事物。

txt_en: Praise is like sunlight to the human spirit, we cannot flower and grow without it.
txt_cn: 对于人的精神来说，赞扬就像阳光一样，没有它我们便不能开花生长。

txt_en: When you forgive, you love. And when you love, God's light shines on you.
txt_cn: 当你原谅他人时，你便是在爱人。当你爱人时，上帝的光芒会照耀着你。

txt_en: It's goodbye, but we lean forward to the next crazy venture beneath the skies.
txt_cn: 我们说了再见，但这也意味着，在广阔天空之下，我们又可以开启另一段疯狂探险。

txt_en: All we can do, for the moment is really we need to do-listen to ourselves. When we are trying to get better, the only truth that matters is what works for.
txt_cn: 我们所能做的，我们真正需要做的就是倾听自己的心声。当我们想让一切好起来的时候，唯一重要是找到适合我们的方法。

txt_en: God never shuts one door but he opens another.
txt_cn: 天无绝人之路。

txt_en: What is the man's first duty? The answer is brief: to be himself.
txt_cn: 一个人的首要职责是什么？答案很简单：做自己。

txt_en: I was surprised, as always, that how easy the act of leaving was, and how good it felt. The world was suddenly rich with possibility.
txt_cn: 和往常一样，我惊讶的发现，离别是如此的简单，出发的感觉是那么的美妙。世界突然充满了可能性。

txt_en: You will be licentious, if you only like someone. But if you love someone, you will be restrained.
txt_cn: 喜欢就会放肆，但爱就是克制。

txt_en: If you feel lost, just take a deep breath and realize that being lost can be turning point of finding out who you truly are, and what you truly want to do.
txt_cn: 如果你迷失了自我，请深呼吸，迷失或许能成为你人生的转折点，让你发现真实的自己，并让你知道自己想要成为怎样的人。

txt_en: Though life is hard, I want it to be boiling.
txt_cn: 虽然辛苦，我还是会选择那种滚烫的人生。

txt_en: I wish the progress bar of my life could move more slowly that I can spare no effort to walk to the end instead of running after time.
txt_cn: 我希望人生的进度条能够再慢一点，如果可以竭尽全力走完，我不想奔跑。

txt_en: If a person loses the past, he can't find the future.
txt_cn: 如果一个人丢掉了过去，他就无法找到未来。

txt_en: Focus on one thing at a time. You can have it all but not all at once.
txt_cn: 一次只关注一件事，你将会拥有一切，但不能一次就全部实现。

txt_en: Time gone is like the flowing water of a gurgling river, where even if one wishes one cannot touch the same water again.
txt_cn: 流逝的时光就像淙淙的小河里奔腾的水，你再也无法感受同一捧水，无论你有多么希望。

txt_en: Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.
txt_cn: 纵然伤心，也不要愁眉不展，因为你不知谁会爱上你的笑容。

txt_en: When we are travelling, we find ourselves in new places and new spaces, physically and internally; it is the same with coaching.
txt_cn: 在我们的旅途中，我们会发现自己置身于新的地理位置，也获得了新的心灵空间；乘马车观光亦是如此。

txt_en: What you disdained may be the life other people strive for, and the failed life you meant may be what other people have painstakingly earned.
txt_cn: 你所嫌弃的，可能是别人拼命想要得到的。你以为失败的人生，也许是别人努力活着的结果。

txt_en: The key to happiness in life is knowing when to keep your mouth shut.
txt_cn: 快乐的秘密就是知道在适当的时候保持沉默。

txt_en: When you have much enough, you must accept that you could have little someday.
txt_cn: 当你拥有足够多的时候，你要做好心理准备，因为在未来的某一天里你可能什么都没有了。

txt_en: Rules existed for a reason: if you followed them, you would succeed; if you didn't, you might burn the world to the ground.
txt_cn: 规则存在是有原因的：如果你遵循它们，你可能会成功；如果你不遵循它们，你可能会毁灭世界。

txt_en: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
txt_cn: 事实是，每个人都会伤害你。你只需要找到那些值得让你忍受伤害的人。

txt_en: I am not judged by the number of times I fail, but by the number of times I succeed; and the number of times I succeed is in direct proportion to the number of times I fail and keep trying.
txt_cn: 别人评判你的往往是成功的次数，没有人会特别在意你失败了多少次。而我成功的记录和屡败屡战的记录成正比。

txt_en: It seems that standing on the side of majority won't be called alien, following the track of most people's life rules can be accepted by the society.
txt_cn: 要站在人类大多数的一边才不会被看作异类，遵循人们生活规律的轨迹才会被人类社会容纳。

txt_en: To be a princess, you have to believe that you are a princess. You've got to walk the way you think a princess would walk. So, you gotta think tall; you gotta smile, wave, and just have fun.
txt_cn: 要想成为公主，你得相信自己就是一个公主。你应该像你所想象中的公主那般行事。因此，你得高瞻远瞩，微笑待人，享受生活。

txt_en: Though unconsciously, people are indeed moving towards their destination. Slow as the progress, seen from the result, it may be surprisingly fast.
txt_cn: 即使是无意识的，人也总是在朝着自己想去的方向前进。虽然前进的步伐实际上是很缓慢的，但从结果来看，却是出人意料的迅速。

txt_en: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgment that something else is more important than fear.
txt_cn: 真正的勇者不是没有恐惧，他们只是明白有比恐惧更重要的东西。

txt_en: Don't be in a hurry to grow up. Hold on to being a boy as long as you can.
txt_cn: 不要急着长大，尽可能地做一个孩子吧。

txt_en: No one ever grows up. They may look grown-up, but it's just the clay of time.
txt_cn: 人永远都长不大。他们只是看起来像大人而已，但这只不过是时光雕塑出来的泥娃娃。

txt_en: People who cannot find time for recreation are obliged sooner or later to find time for illness.
txt_cn: 腾不出时间娱乐的人，早晚会被迫腾出时间生病。

txt_en: The shortest way to do many things is to do one thing at a time.
txt_cn: 做许多事情的捷径就是一次只做一件事。

txt_en: It's probably hard for you to imagine how it feels to have your destiny be predetermined at birth.
txt_cn: 你可能很难想象：当你出生时命运就已经注定了是什么感觉。

txt_en: The reason why a great man is great is that he resolves to be a great man.
txt_cn: 伟人之所以伟大，是因为他立志要成为伟大的人。

txt_en: If you look for it, I've got a sneaky feeling you'll find that love actually is all around.
txt_cn: 如果你仔细寻找，就会发现爱无处不在。

txt_en: You don't get to choose how you're going to die, or when. You can only decide how you're going to live now.
txt_cn: 你不能选择怎样死或什么时候死，你只能决定现在怎样生活。

txt_en: Interests are anchors, and I believe they will bring peace and even happiness in the end.
txt_cn: 兴趣是锚，我相信它最终会带来和平，甚至幸福。

txt_en: Difficult doesn't mean impossible. It simply means that you have to work hard.
txt_cn: 困难并不代表不可能，它仅仅意味着你必须努力奋斗。

txt_en: Life is like an ice cream, enjoy it before it melts.
txt_cn: 生活就像冰淇淋，在融化之前好好享用它。

txt_en: We get to decide what our story is. Nobody else gets to tell you what your story is.
txt_cn: 我们的故事由我们自己决定，轮不到别人对你指手画脚。

txt_en: It seems like life is too short to hold grudges.
txt_cn: 人生苦短，何必留仇。

txt_en: Roads in the mountains teach you a very important lesson in life. What seems like an end is very often just a bend.
txt_cn: 山间公路教会你人生中非常重要的一课，看似到了尽头，实际通常只是个弯道。

txt_en: A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
txt_cn: 船停在港湾固然安全，但这并不是船的初衷。

txt_en: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
txt_cn: 善良是一种聋子能听见、盲人能看见的语言。

txt_en: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.
txt_cn: 皱纹应该只是微笑留下的印记。

txt_en: The human race has one really effective weapon, and that is laughter.
txt_cn: 人类有一件真正有力的武器，那就是笑。

txt_en: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
txt_cn: 远离那些企图让你丧失雄心的人吧。小人经常如此，而真正的伟人会让你觉得你也可以变得伟大。

txt_en: Never deter till tomorrow that which you can do today.
txt_cn: 今日事须今日毕，切勿拖延到明天。

txt_en: One minute on the stage needs ten years practice off stage.
txt_cn: 台上一分钟，台下十年功。

txt_en: The fool didn't know it was impossible, so he did it.
txt_cn: 傻瓜不知道这事儿是不可能的，所以他做到了。

txt_en: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather long for the endless immensity of sea.
txt_cn: 如果你想造一艘船，先不要雇人收集木头，也不要给人分配任务，而是激发他们对海洋的渴望。

txt_en: Happiness is only real when shared!
txt_cn: 与人分享的快乐才是真正的快乐！

txt_en: It's goodbye, but we lean forward to the next crazy venture beneath the skies.
txt_cn: 我们说了再见，但这也意味着，在广阔天空之下，我们又可以开启另一段疯狂探险。

txt_en: Most people grow up from sufferings, with optimistic attitude to struggle, one can thrive, otherwise one will be abandoned by his or her own life.
txt_cn: 人是从苦难中成长起来的，唯有乐观奋斗，才能不断茁壮，反之则易埋没。

txt_en: If people in the communications only think about gains and losses of interest, then the pleasure of knowing each other will cease to exist.
txt_cn: 如果人与人交往只想着利益得失，那么相识相知的愉悦也就不复存在了。

txt_en: Faced with a same job, it is your attitude that gives you surprise or sorrow.
txt_cn: 一份同样的工作，因为心态不同，既可能精彩，也可能痛苦。

txt_en: Icicle is not a symbol o chillness but a sign of warming.
txt_cn: 冰柱不是严寒的象征，而是天气变暖的标志。

txt_en: Sometimes you hold onto things, not because you want to keep them, but because they are difficult to let go.
txt_cn: 有时候你抓紧某些东西，并不是因为你想要留住它们，而是因为放手实在太难了。

txt_en: Repeating this kind of dull life all the time, seemingly, I really live a very hard life.
txt_cn: 这种平平淡淡的日常生活，老是这么日复一日的话，也挺苦的吧。

txt_en: Letting go of sad and gloomy memories, then embracing a fresher and brighter world.
txt_cn: 放开悲伤的回忆，才能拥抱更鲜活的世界。

txt_en: I choose to run towards my problems, and not away from them. Because that is what heroes do.
txt_cn: 我选择直面问题，而不是逃避，因为英雄就是这么做的。

txt_en: You know some birds are not meant to be caged, their feathers are just too bright.
txt_cn: 你知道，有些鸟儿是注定不会被关在牢笼里的，它们的每一片羽毛都闪耀着自由地光辉。

txt_en: Option A is not available. So let's just kick the shit out of Option B.
txt_cn: 既然没有A选项了，那让我们尽可能地利用B选项吧。

txt_en: Love is not about how find out the similarities, it is about how to respect the differences.
txt_cn: 爱情不是寻找共同点，而是学会尊重不同点。

txt_en: Getting rid of the fetters of fame, one can concentrate on his technique.
txt_cn: 人若无名，便可专心练剑。

txt_en: When you wake up, you need to think that something great is going to happen today, and that you are going to have a great day.
txt_cn: 在你醒来的时候，你需要想着美好的事情即将发生，这将会让你拥有非常棒的一天。

txt_en: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
txt_cn: 朋友是什么？两幅躯壳拥有同一个灵魂。

txt_en: Counting blessings can actually increase happiness and health by reminding us of the good things in life.
txt_cn: 细数幸福的事情确实可以提醒我们生活中存在的美好，还能增加我们的幸福感，保持身心健康。

txt_en: It's always the simple things, well executed, that are memorable.
txt_cn: 认真做好的事情，即使非常简单却总是令人难忘。

txt_en: Tourism doesn't care about the destination, but care about the way people and things and those wonderful memories and scenery.
txt_cn: 旅游不在乎终点，而是在意途中的人和事还有那些美好的记忆和景色。

txt_en: A mother's love makes a child feel: the arrival of the world is beautiful; mother's love in the child gradually instill the love of life, and not just hope alive.
txt_cn: 母爱使孩子感到：降临人间是美好的；母爱在孩子身上逐渐灌输了对生命的热爱，而不仅仅希望活着就是了。

txt_en: If you listen to the music, the world changes. It's like falling in love. Only no one gets hurt.
txt_cn: 当你聆听音乐时，仿佛世界都变了。这种感觉就像是陷入爱情，只不过没有人会受伤。

txt_en: Affection is when you see someone's strength, love is when you accept someone's flaws.
txt_cn: 爱恋是只看到对方的好，而爱情是连对方的缺陷都包容。

txt_en: Learning is like rowing upstream, not to advance is to drop back.
txt_cn: 学习如逆水行舟，不进则退。

txt_en: Not everything that counts can be counted, and not everything that's counted truly counts.
txt_cn: 不是所有有价值的事物都可以被计算，也不是所有可计算的事物都值得去计算。

txt_en: Can a man still be brave if he's afraid? That is the only time a man can be brave.
txt_cn: 人在恐惧的时候还能勇敢吗？人唯有恐惧的时候方能勇敢。

txt_en: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing.
txt_cn: 别到处跟别人抱怨这个世界欠你什么，这个世界什么都不欠你的。

txt_en: Failure is the fog through which we glimpse triumph.
txt_cn: 失败是一团迷雾，穿过它，我们可以瞥见胜利。

txt_en: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.
txt_cn: 面对敌人需要勇气，但敢于直面朋友，需要更大的勇气。

txt_en: Hypocritical friendship is like your shadow; when you are in the sun, it will closely follow you, but once you go into the shadow, it will leave you.
txt_cn: 虚伪的友谊就如你的影子；当你处在阳光下时，它会紧紧地跟着你，但你一旦走到阴暗处时，它立刻就会离开你。

txt_en: Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.
txt_cn: 努力成为别人乌云里的一道彩虹。

txt_en: Content makes poor men rich; discontent makes rich men poor.
txt_cn: 知足使贫穷的人富有；而贪婪使富足的人贫穷。

txt_en: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
txt_cn: 当幸福之门关上了，另一扇门也会为你打开；但就是我们一直在意关上的那扇门，而没有发现早已打开等待着我们的这一扇门。

txt_en: No matter what situation we face, no matter how contradictory our hearts are, we always have a choice. What kind of person we are depends on who we choose to be.
txt_cn: 不管我们面对什么处境，不管我们的内心多么矛盾，我们总有选择。我们是什么样的人，取决于我们选择做什么样的人。

txt_en: The world may be full of cheating, however we never lack friends with a warm heart.
txt_cn: 有时候世界虽然是假的，但并不缺少真心对待我们的人。

txt_en: I'm only brave when I have to be. Being brave doesn't mean you go looking for trouble.
txt_cn: 我只是在必要的时候才会勇敢，勇敢并不代表你要到处闯祸。

txt_en: Once you choose your way of life, be brave to stick it out and never return.
txt_cn: 生活的道路一旦选定，就要勇敢地走到底，绝不回头。

txt_en: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
txt_cn: 优于别人，并不高贵，真正的高贵应该是优于过去的自己。

txt_en: The most difficult stage in life is not when no one understands you, but when you don't understand yourself.
txt_cn: 生命中最艰难的阶段不是没有人懂你，而是你不懂你自己。

txt_en: Sometimes it takes going through something so awful to realize the beauty that is out there in this world.
txt_cn: 有时候就是要经历一些糟糕的事情才能意识到世间存在的美丽。

txt_en: There are many endeavors to bring pleasure to people. Some places are making something you take inside. Not the food, but the experience.
txt_cn: 很多事情只要努力就可以带给人快乐。有的地方能让你收获在心的不是食物，而是经历。

txt_en: Since death is the destined terminal of human beings, how to finish the life road will really matter.
txt_cn: 既然人总是要死的，那就得讲究活法了。

txt_en: Don't aim for success if you want it. Just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
txt_cn: 如果你想成功，不要刻意地追求成功。只要你干自己热爱的工作并相信它，成功就自然会到来。

txt_en: The foundation of knowledge must be laid by reading. General principles must come from books, which, however, must be brought to the test of real life.
txt_cn: 读书是积累知识的基础。基础原理来源于书本，但须经实际生活的检验。

txt_en: You'll never move others, heart to heart, unless your speech comes from your heart.
txt_cn: 如果你说的话并非发自你的内心，你就不可能触动别人的心弦。

txt_en: Love is ever the beginning of knowledge as fire is of light.
txt_cn: 知识总是从爱好开始，犹如光总是从火开始一样。

txt_en: The failures and reverses which await men- and one after another sadden the brow of youth- add a dignity to the prospect of human life, which no Arcadian success would do.
txt_cn: 尽管失败和挫折等待着人们，一次次地夺走青春的容颜，但却给人生的前景增添了一份尊严，这是任何顺利的成功都不能做到的。

txt_en: A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.
txt_cn: 一个人可以失败很多次，但是只要他没有开始责怪旁人，他还不是一个失败者。

txt_en: I don't know if we each have a destiny, or if we're all just floating around accidentally like on a breeze.
txt_cn: 我不懂我们是否有着各自的命运，还是只是到处随风飘荡。

txt_en: There is no royal road to science, and only those who do not dread the fatiguing climb of gaining its numinous summits.
txt_cn: 在科学上没有平坦的大道，只有不畏劳苦沿着崎岖之路攀登的人，才有希望达到它光辉的顶点。

txt_en: You make millions of decisions that mean nothing and then one day your order takes out and it changes your life.
txt_cn: 你每天都在做很多看起来毫无意义的决定，但某天你的某个决定就能改变你的一生。

txt_en: When you finally get your own happiness, you will understand the previous sadness is a kind of treasure, which makes you better to hold and cherish the people you love.
txt_cn: 等你获得真正属于你的幸福之后，你就会明白一起的伤痛其实是一种财富，它让你学会更好地去把握和珍惜你爱的人。

txt_en: An unacceptable love needs no sorrow but time- some time for forgetting. A badly-hurt heart needs no sympathy but understanding.
txt_cn: 一段不被接受的爱情，需要的不是伤心，而是时间，一段可以用来遗忘的时间。一颗被伤了的心，需要的不是同情，而是明白。

txt_en: I love and am used to keeping a distance with those changed things. Only in this way can I know what will not be abandoned by time.
txt_cn: 我喜欢并习惯了对变化的东西保持着距离，这样才会知道什么是最不会被时间抛弃的准则。

txt_en: Few things are impossible in themselves; and it is often for want of will, rather than of means, that man fails to succeed.
txt_cn: 事情很少有根本做不成的；其所以做不成，与其说是条件不够，不如说是由于决心不够。

txt_en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. So let us seize it, not in fear, but in gladness.
txt_cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。因此，让我们毫无畏惧，满心愉悦地把握命运。

txt_en: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for circumstances they want, and if they cannot find them, make them.
txt_cn: 在这个世界上取得成就的人，都努力去寻找他们想要的机会，如果找不到机会，他们便自己创造机会。

txt_en: If you wish to succeed, you should use persistence as your good friend, experience as your reference, prudence as your brother and hope as your sentry.
txt_cn: 如果你希望成功，当以恒心为良友，以经验为参谋，以谨慎为兄弟，以希望为哨兵。

txt_en: There is nothing that we can do for someone who doesn't appreciate what's in front of them.
txt_cn: 对于一个不懂得珍惜良机的人来说，无论我们如何努力都是徒劳。

txt_en: Here comes a point when a reasonable man will swallow his pride and admit that he's made a terrible mistake.
txt_cn: 懂道理的人，终会按下自尊，坦诚他犯下严重错误的时刻。

txt_en: The more difficult something is, the more rewarding it is in the end.
txt_cn: 事情愈艰难，最后愈能得到丰厚的果实。

txt_en: The most affectionate love I imagined is that I live as you used to be after you've gone away.
txt_cn: 我所认为最深沉的爱，莫过于分开以后，我将自己，活成了你的样子。

txt_en: If every unfolding we experience takes us further along in life, then, we are truly experiencing what life is offering.
txt_cn: 如果我们在人生中体验的每一次转变都让我们在生活中走得更远，那么，我们就真正的体验到了生活想让我们体验的东西。

txt_en: My heart was pounding the whole time. It was the most erotic moment of my life. Up until then, at least.
txt_cn: 当时我的心一直像小鹿乱撞，那应该是我这辈子最性感的一刻了，至少在此之前没有过。

txt_en: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
txt_cn: 表现我们真正的自我，是我们自己的选择，这比我们所具有的能力更重要。

txt_en: Only through unity can we have a strong, if the split, then a single blow.
txt_cn: 我们只有团结才会强大，如果分裂，便不堪一击。

txt_en: God shall wipe away all the tears from their eyes, and there shall be no more death. Neither shall there be sorrow or dying, neither shall there be any more pain, for the former world has passed away.
txt_cn: 上帝擦去他们所有的眼泪，不再有死亡，也不再有悲伤和生离死别，不再有痛苦，因往事已矣。

txt_en: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness. Nothing more.
txt_cn: 当我们在面对黑暗和死亡的时候，我们害怕的只是未知，除此之外，没有别的。

txt_en: A man is not old as long as he is seeking something. A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
txt_cn: 只要一个人还有追求，他就没有老。直到后悔取代了梦想，一个人才算老。

txt_en: I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it.
txt_cn: 我不同意你说的话，但我愿意誓死捍卫你说话的权利。

txt_en: You don't know how long I've waited for you. I'd rather die than stay away from you.
txt_cn: 你怎知我等了你多久，就算是以死来换得与你厮守，我也愿意。

txt_en: It is the tears of the earth that keep her smiles in bloom.
txt_cn: 是大地的泪点使她的微笑保持着青春不谢。

txt_en: I never give anything without expecting something in return. I always get paid.
txt_cn: 我做任何事情不过是为了有所回报，我总要得到报酬。

txt_en: I figure life is a gift. I don’t intend on wasting it. To make each day count!
txt_cn: 我认为生活就是上帝的恩赐。我不会白白浪费生命。让我们过好每一天！

txt_en: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
txt_cn: 最好的爱能唤醒灵魂启发我们追求卓越，在我们的心里种下热情的火苗，并带给我们心灵的平静。

txt_en: In fact, if I close my eyes, I can still see you there just standing in the dawn light.
txt_cn: 只要我闭上眼睛，就仿佛还能看到你站在那里，沐浴着黎明的曙光。

txt_en: Not until you see someone couple up will you realize how much you love him.
txt_cn: 你永远也不晓得自己有多喜欢一个人，除非你看见他和别人在一起。

txt_en: I can't turn away without knowing you'll be all right. That's all I want.
txt_cn: 除非你过得好，否则我是不会放手的，这就是我想要的。

txt_en: There is no such thing as a great talent without great will.
txt_cn: 没有伟大的意志力，便没有雄才大略。

txt_en: It had been a wonderful evening and what I needed now, to give it a perfect ending, was a little of the Ludwig Van.
txt_cn: 真是个完美的晚上，我现在需要的就是给它来个完美的结束，比如说一小段贝多芬。

txt_en: And as usual, my friend warned me not to cherish too big hope, but it is very difficult to do.
txt_cn: 和往常一样，我的朋友提醒我不要抱太大希望，但是这点很难做到。

txt_en: Do not, for one repulse, give up the purpose that you resolved to effect.
txt_cn: 不要只因一次失败，就放弃你原来决心想要达到的目的。

txt_en: Death is just a part of life, something we're all destined to do.
txt_cn: 死亡只是生命的一部分，是我们注定要做的一件事。

txt_en: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free. It takes a strong man to save himself, and a great man to save another.
txt_cn: 懦怯囚禁人的灵魂，希望可以令你感受自由。强者自救，圣者渡人。

txt_en: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking.
txt_cn: 成就一番伟业的唯一途径就是热爱自己的事业。如果你还没找到，继续寻找不要放弃。跟随自己的心，总有一天你会找到。

txt_en: Your mind is like this water, my friend. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.
txt_cn: 我的朋友，你的心好似这潭湖水，如果波澜起伏就会模糊不清，不过当它平静下来，答案就清澈见底了。

txt_en: You're throwing away happiness with both hands and reaching out for something that will never make you happy.
txt_cn: 你在把自己的幸福拱手相让去追求一些根本不会让你幸福的东西。

txt_en: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
txt_cn: 变老无关乎物质，只在乎心灵。如果自己不介意，那么没人会在意。

txt_en: The older I grow the more I distrust the familiar doctrine that age brings wisdom.
txt_cn: 年纪越大我就越不相信那句教条：年龄带给人智慧。

txt_en: The secret of man's being is not only to live but to have something to live for.
txt_cn: 人类生存的秘密，不但是要活，还要知道为何而活。

txt_en: The lover of nature is he whose inward and outward senses are still truly adjusted to each other; who has retained the spirit of infancy even into the era of manhood.
txt_cn: 热爱大自然的人内外感觉协调一致，即使进入成年后依然保持着童心。

txt_en: All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain. Time to die.
txt_cn: 所有这些瞬间，都将湮没于时间的洪流中。就像泪水消逝在雨中一样。死期到了。

txt_en: There is a saying: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
txt_cn: 俗话说昨日已成往事，未来还未可知，今时却是上苍所给的礼物，这也就是为什么我们称今时为礼物。

txt_en: I have to remind myself that some birds aren't meant to be caged. Their feathers are just too bright.
txt_cn: 我必须时刻提醒自己有些鸟儿注定不会被关在牢笼里，它们的每一片羽毛都闪耀着自由的光辉。

txt_en: The world is a fine place and worth fighting for.
txt_cn: 这世界真是个好地方，值得为它奋斗。

txt_en: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
txt_cn: 紫罗兰把它的香气留在那踩扁了它的脚踝上，这就是宽恕。

txt_en: I came here tonight because when you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
txt_cn: 若我想与你共度余生，我希望我的余生尽早开始。

txt_en: Human felicity is produced not so much by great pieces of good fortune that seldom happen, as by little advantages that occur every day.
txt_cn: 与其说人类的幸福来自偶尔发生的鸿运，不如说来自每天都有的小实惠。

txt_en: Somewhere beyond right and wrong, there is a garden, I will meet you there.
txt_cn: 在超离是非之处有座花园，我会在那里与你相遇。

txt_en: He was still too young to know that the heart's memory eliminates the bad and magnifies the good, and that thanks to this artifice we manage to endure the burden of the past.
txt_cn: 当时他还太年轻，不知道人内心会删除糟糕的记忆、放大美好的记忆。也正是因为这个功能，我们才能背负着过去的负担前行。

txt_en: Happiness lies not in the mere possession of money, it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
txt_cn: 幸福不在于拥有金钱，而在于获得成就时的喜悦以及产生创造力的激情。

txt_en: In spite of you and me and the whole silly world going to pieces around us, I love you.
txt_cn: 哪怕是世界末日，我都会爱着你。

txt_en: When you meet someone and you're attracted to them, it just means that your subconscious is attracted to their subconscious, subconsciously.
txt_cn: 当你被某个人吸引时，那只是意味着你俩在潜意识里互相吸引。

txt_en: Time erodes all such beauty but what it cannot diminish is the wonderful workings of your mind, your humor, your kindness and your moral courage.
txt_cn: 时间可以吞噬一切，但它丝毫无法减少的是你伟大的思想，你的幽默，你的善良还有你的勇气。

txt_en: Storm clouds may gather and stars may collide but I love you until the end of time.
txt_cn: 暴风雨的乌云可能会聚集，星辰可能会碰撞，可是我会永远爱你直到地老天荒。

txt_en: I would rather sit on a pumpkin and have it all to myself, than be crowded on a velvet cushion.
txt_cn: 我宁愿住在乡村小镇上自得其乐，而不愿和人一起挤在天鹅绒的坐垫上。

txt_en: You must strive to find your own voice. Because the longer you wait to begin, the less likely you are to find it at all.
txt_cn: 你们必须努力寻找自己的声音，因为你越迟开始寻找,找到的可能性就越小。

txt_en: No matter what happens, or how bad it seems today, life does go on, and it will be better tomorrow.
txt_cn: 不管发生什么，不管今天看起来多么糟糕，生活都会继续，明天会更好。

txt_en: If there is any kind of magic in the world, it must be the attempt of understanding someone or sharing something.
txt_cn: 如果世上真的有什么奇迹，那么一定是去理解他人和与人分享。

txt_en: It is the business of the very few to be independent; it is a privilege of the strong.
txt_cn: 只有少数人能做到独立自主；那是强者的特权。

txt_en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. So let us seize it, not in fear, but in gladness.
txt_cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒,而是机会之杯. 因此,让我们毫无畏惧,满心愉悦地把握命运。

txt_en: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
txt_cn: 如果我们有勇气去追求，所有的梦想都可以现实。

txt_en: A great poem is a fountain forever overflowing with the waters of wisdom and delight.
txt_cn: 一首伟大的诗犹如一座喷泉，不断地喷出智慧和快乐的泉水

txt_en: As selfishness and complaint pervert the mind,so love with its joy clears and sharpens the vision.
txt_cn: 自私和抱怨是心灵的阴暗，愉快的爱则使视野明朗开阔。

txt_en: You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret.
txt_cn: 人必须相信自己，这是成功的秘诀。

txt_en: It is only in the mysterious equations of love that any logic or reasons can be found.
txt_cn: 只有在这种神秘的爱情方程中，才能找到逻辑或原由。

txt_en: There are two motives for reading a book: one, that you enjoy it; the other, that you can boast about it.
txt_cn: 读书有两种动机：一是从中获得乐趣；另一种则是可以向人夸耀。

txt_en: I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.
txt_cn: 我所能奉献的没有其他，只有热血、辛劳、眼泪与汗水。

txt_en: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest minds of past centuries.
txt_cn: 读好书，如同与先哲们交谈。

txt_en: New lovers are nervous and tender, but smash everything- for the heart is an organ of fire.
txt_cn: 初恋的人们心存紧张并满怀柔情，但却可以抵御一切—— 只因为心如烈火！

txt_en: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of human freedoms- to choose one's  attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.
txt_cn: 我可以拿走人的任何东西，但有一样不行，这就是在特定环境下选择自己的生活态度的自由。

txt_en: It's the unspoken truth of humanity that you crave subjugation. The bright lure of freedom diminishes your life's joy in a mad scramble for power, for identity.
txt_cn: 这才是人性的本质，你们内心渴望被征服，疲于追逐光鲜的自由，而丢失了生活的乐趣，迷失在权利的角逐，就为获得认同。

txt_en: We have no more right to consume happiness without producing it than to consume wealth without producing it.
txt_cn: 不创造幸福的人无权享用幸福，正如不创造财富的人无权享用财富一样。

txt_en: I feel heartfelt sorrow for the mother of Private James Ryan and am willing to lay down my life and the lives of my men – especially you, Reiben – to ease her suffering.
txt_cn: 我为瑞恩的母亲由衷感到悲哀，我愿意用我和弟兄们的生命去拯救你的生命来减轻她的苦痛。

txt_en: You played out your happiness on a piano that was not infinite. I learned to live that way.
txt_cn: 在有限的钢琴上，我自得其乐，我过惯那样的日子了。

txt_en: Learning is an ornament in prosperity, a refuge in adversity, and a provision in old age.
txt_cn: 学问在成功时是装饰品，在失意时是庇护所，在年老时是供应品。

txt_en: Go back to England, and tell them there, that Scotland's daughters and sons are yours no more. Tell them Scotland is free.
txt_cn: 回去告诉整个英格兰，苏格兰儿女不再是他们的臣民，告诉他们苏格兰是自由的。

txt_en: The tragedy of life is not so much what men suffer, but what they miss.
txt_cn: 生活的悲剧不在于人们受多少苦，而在于人们错过了什么。

txt_en: Sometimes your whole life boils down to one insane move.
txt_cn: 人一生中出人头地的机会不多，一旦有了一定要抓住机会！

txt_en: Without you, today's emotions would be the scurf of yesterday's.
txt_cn: 如果没有你，如此的良辰美景让我去向何人诉说？

txt_en: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
txt_cn: 虽然世界多苦难，但是苦难总是能战胜的。

txt_en: I had always heard your entire life flashes in front of your eyes the second before you die. First of all, that one second isn’t a second at all, it stretches on forever, like an ocean of time.
txt_cn: 听说人在死前的一秒钟，其一生会闪过眼前。其实不是一秒，而是无尽的时间，时间海洋。

txt_en: A single idea from the human mind can build cities. An idea can transform the world and rewrite all the rules.
txt_cn: 人类一个简单的念头可以创造城市。一个念头可以改变世界，重写规则。

txt_en: Every person has two educations, one which he receives from others, and one, more important, which he gives to himself.
txt_cn: 每个人都受两种教育，一种来自别人，另一种更重要，是来自自己。

txt_en: I'm proud to have served with each and every one of you. You deserve long and happy lives in peace.
txt_cn: 我很骄傲能与你们每个人共同服役，你们有权享受永远快乐的和平生活。

txt_en: When peace has been broken anywhere, the peace of all countries everywhere is in danger.
txt_cn: 无论哪个地区的和平遭到破坏，世界各国的和平都会受到威胁。

txt_en: Rudeness is merely an expression of fear.
txt_cn: 无礼只是恐惧的一种表露。

txt_en: Until such time as the world ends, we will act as though it intends to spin on.
txt_cn: 不到地球毁灭那一刻，我们都得做好本职工作。

txt_en: If you want to live your whole life free from pain, you must become either a god or else a corpse. Consider other men's troubles and that will comfort yours.
txt_cn: 如果你想一生摆脱苦难，你就得是神或者是死尸。想想他人的不幸，你就能坦然面对人生。

txt_en: Innovation distinguishes between the leader and the follower.
txt_cn: 领导者和跟随者的区别在于是否有创新能力。

txt_en: If you wish to survive, you need to cultivate a strong mental attitude.
txt_cn: 如果你想活着，你需要培养一种坚强的精神态度

txt_en: Rudeness is merely the expression of fear. People fear they won't get what they want. The most dreadful and unattractive person only needs to be loved, and they will open up like a flower.
txt_cn: 粗鲁只是恐惧的表现。人们恐惧无法得到所期望的。最可怕的、不招人喜爱的人也只是需要被爱，那么他们便会像花儿般绽放。

txt_en: Pay attention to your enemies, for they are the first to discover your mistakes.
txt_cn: 要重视你的敌人，因为他们总是能第一个发现你的错误。

txt_en: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
txt_cn: 天才等于百分之一的灵感加百分之九十九的汗水。

txt_en: The three foundations of learning: seeing much, suffering much and studying much.
txt_cn: 求学的三个基本条件：多观察，多吃苦，多研究。

txt_en: When a man is wrapped up in himself, he makes a pretty little package.
txt_cn: 一个只顾自己的人不足以成大器。

txt_en: Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone,” he told me, “just remember that all the people in this world haven’t had the advantages that you’ve had.
txt_cn: 每当你觉得想要批评什么人的时候，你且要记着，这个世界上的人并非都具备你禀有的条件。

txt_en: I know you'll never forgive me, and I don't blame you. I wouldn't forgive me either. I was ignorant and irresponsible and small-minded.
txt_cn: 我知道，你永远都不会原谅我。我不怪你，换做我，我也不会原谅我自己。 我又无知，又不负责，心胸也十分狭窄。

txt_en: People think the writer's imagination is always at work, that he's constantly inventing an endless supply of incidents and episodes; that he simply dreams up his stories out of thin air.
txt_cn: 人们认为作家的想象力永不枯竭，所以他能够源源不断地创作出各种事件和情节，并且他们创作的故事仅仅是凭空而造的。

txt_en: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
txt_cn: 永远记住：决心成功比任何一件事都重要。

txt_en: It has done me good, because of the color of the wheat fields. Go and look again at the roses. You will understand now that yours is unique in all the world.
txt_cn: 驯服对我是有好处的——因为麦田的颜色。再回头看那些玫瑰花吧！到时你就明白你的玫瑰花仍是举世无双的一朵花。

txt_en: And now here is my secret, a very simple secret: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
txt_cn: 这是我的一个秘密，一个再简单不过的秘密：一个人只有用心去看，才能看到真实。事情的真相仅凭肉眼是无法看穿的。

txt_en: Every new day begins with possibilities. It's up to us to fill it with the things that move us toward progress and peace.
txt_cn: 每一天都以无限的可能开始，我们本身决定着这一天是否进步或者安心。

txt_en: If you are not in good control of time or cannot set priorities for different matters, what you do is surely to be rebated.
txt_cn: 无法充分掌握时间、区别事情的缓急先后，你所做的一切都大打折扣

txt_en: If time being of all things the most precious, wasting time must be the greatest prodigality.
txt_cn: 如果时间是最宝贵的东西，浪费时间应该是最大的挥霍。

txt_en: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work and learning from failure.
txt_cn: 成功没有秘诀。它源自充分的准备，努力地工作，来自从失败中汲取的教训。

txt_en: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
txt_cn: 局限只存在于我们的大脑中。可是如果我们运用自己的想象力，就会获得无限的可能性。

txt_en: Some of the world's greatest feats were accomplished by people not smart enough to know they were impossible.
txt_cn: 世上有些丰功伟绩之所以能缔造，是因为有些人不够“聪明”，不知道那些原是不可能的。

txt_en: The future is simply infinite possibility waiting to happen. What it waits on is human imagination to crystallize its possibilities.
txt_cn: 未来就是有待发生的可能性。它等待着人类的想象力将这些可能变成现实。

txt_en: There are betrayals in war that are childlike compared with our human betrayals during peace.
txt_cn: 战火硝烟中的背叛与我们在太平盛世中的背叛相较而言，就天真单纯得多了！

txt_en: After the rain, the sun will reappear. There is life. After the pain, the joy will be here.
txt_cn: 雨后必见太阳。这就是生活。正如痛苦过后必见快乐。

txt_en: One is always on a strange road, watching strange scenery and listening to strange music. Then one day, you will find that the things you try hard to forget are already gone.
txt_cn: 一个人总要走陌生的路，看陌生的风景，听陌生的歌，然后在某个不经意的瞬间，你会发现，原本是费尽心机想要忘记的事情真的就那么忘记了。

txt_en: Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.
txt_cn: 生活没有目标，犹如航海没有罗盘。

txt_en: Happiness is not about being immortal nor having food or rights in one's hand. It’s about having each tiny wish come true, or having something to eat when you are hungry or having someone's love when you need love.
txt_cn: 幸福，不是长生不老，不是大鱼大肉，不是权倾朝野。幸福是能够实现每个小愿望，饿的时候有的吃，需要爱的时候有人爱。

txt_en: Towering genius disdains a beaten path. It seeks regions hitherto unexplored.
txt_cn: 卓越的天才不屑走旁人走过的路。他寻找迄今未开拓的地区。

txt_en: Fear not that the life shall come to an end, but rather fear that it shall never have a beginning.
txt_cn: 不要害怕你的生活将要结束，应该担心你的生活永远还未真正开始。

txt_en: Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is below even defeat, and is born vanquished.
txt_cn: 只有强者才懂得争斗；弱者甚至失败都不够资格，而是生来就是被征服的。

txt_en: The failures and reverses which await men-and one after another sadden the brow of youth-add a dignity to the prospect of human life, which no Arcadian success would do.
txt_cn: 尽管失败和挫折等待着人们，一次次地夺走青春的容颜，但却给人生的前景增添了一份尊严，这是任何顺利的成功都不能做到的。

txt_en: If you really love someone, the whole life will not be enough. You need time to know, to forgive and to love. All this needs a very big mind.
txt_cn: 爱的次数不需多，只需真爱。真爱需要时间去经营，需要用心去了解，需要胸襟去包容。

txt_en: The rain will stop, the night will end, the hurt will fade. Hope is never so lost that it can't be found.
txt_cn: 雨会停，夜有终，伤会消。希望其实一直等待着我们去寻找。

txt_en: Miracles sometimes occur, but one has to work terribly for them.
txt_cn: 奇迹有时候是会发生的，但是你得为之拼命地努力。

txt_en: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
txt_cn: 人生的目的在于服务他人、同情怜悯和乐于助人。
