txt_en: I think people just get frustrated without harsh, life can be. So they're spending their time dwelling on that frustration we calling it anger. keep their eyes shut to the wholeness of the situation.
txt_cn: 我觉得有些人只对生活的艰苦灰心丧气，因此把时间都浪费在灰心丧气里，我们称之为愤怒，对事物的整体视而不见，对于所有能够成功的微小元素视而不见。

txt_en: Good love makes you see the whole world from one person while bad love makes you abandon the whole world for one person.
txt_cn: 好的爱情是你透过一个人看到全世界，坏的爱情是你为了一个人放弃全世界。

txt_en: And when they let you down,you get up off the ground. Cause morning rolls around. And it's another day of sun.
txt_cn: 当人们令你失望，你更要勇往直前，因为早晨到来，又是阳光灿烂的一天。

txt_en: Do not, for one repulse, forgo the purpose that you resolved to effort.
txt_cn: 不要只因一次挫败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的目的。

txt_en: A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.
txt_cn: 一个人可以失败很多次，但是只要他没有开始责怪旁人，他还不是一个失败者。

txt_en: If there were less sympathy in the world, there would be less trouble in the world.
txt_cn: 如果世界上少一些同情，世界上也就会少一些麻烦。

txt_en: What is the most resilient parasite? Bacteria? A virus? An intestinal worm? An idea.
txt_cn: 最具有可塑性的寄生生物是什么？是细菌吗？是病毒吗？是肠虫吗？其实是人的想法。

txt_en: Some people hear their own inner voices with great clearness. And they live by what they hear. Such people become crazy, or they become legends.
txt_cn: 有些人能清楚地听到自己内心深处的声音，并以此行事。这些人要么变成了疯子，要么成为传奇。

txt_en: The things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.
txt_cn: 失去的东西到最后总有办法回来的，尽管有时会出乎我们的意料。

txt_en: Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
txt_cn: 所有幸福的家庭都相似，而每个不幸的家庭各不同。

txt_en: The truth is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.
txt_cn: 真相是一种美丽又可怕的东西，需要格外谨慎地对待。

txt_en: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself.
txt_cn: 明白事理的人使自己适应世界;不明事理的人想使世界适应自己。

txt_en: Don’t forget the things you once owned. Treasure the things you can’t get. Don't give up the things that belong to you and keep those lost things in memory.
txt_cn: 曾经拥有的，不要忘记。不能得到的，更要珍惜。属于自己的，不要放弃。已经失去的，留作回忆。

txt_en: It doesn't matter if the guy is perfect or the girl is perfect, as long as they are perfect for each other.
txt_cn: 那个小伙子是否完美，或者那个姑娘是否完美都不重要，只要他们能珠联璧合。

txt_en: If the people we love are stolen from us, the way to have them live on is to never stop loving them. Buildings burn, people die, but real love is forever.
txt_cn: 如果我们所爱的人从我们身边被偷走，要使他们继续留在我们身边，就要记住他们。建筑会被焚毁，人会死去，而真爱永存。

txt_en: Don't be sad! Because God sends hope in the most desperate moments. Don't forget, the heaviest rain comes out of the darkest clouds.
txt_cn: 不要悲伤！因为上帝在最绝望的时刻给我们带来希望。不要忘记，最大的雨来自最黑暗的云。

txt_en: The instinct of a man is to pursue everything that flies from him, and to fly from all that pursue him.
txt_cn: 人的本能是追逐从他身边飞走的东西，却逃避追逐他的东西。

txt_en: I was blessed to have you in my life. When I look back on these days, I’ll look and see your face. You were right there for me.
txt_cn: 在我的生命中有你是多么幸运,当我回忆过去, 眼前就会浮现你的脸庞 ,你总会在那守候着我。

txt_en: In this world there are only two tragedies. One is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.
txt_cn: 在这个世界上只有两种悲剧：一种是得不到自己想要的东西，另一种是得到了。

txt_en: With jewelry dress up oneself, is inferior to equip themselves with knowledge.
txt_cn: 用珠宝打扮自己，不如用知识充实自己。

txt_en: The secret of being miserable is to have leisure to bother about whether you are happy or not.
txt_cn: 痛苦的秘密在于有闲工夫担心自己是否幸福。

txt_en: In education we are striving not to teach youth to make a living, but to make a life.
txt_cn: 教育不是为了教会青年人谋生，而是教会他们创造生活。

txt_en: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
txt_cn: 非常奇怪的是，这世上匹夫之勇非常常见，而道德上的勇气几乎没有。

txt_en: Ideal is the beacon. Without ideal, there is no secure direction; without direction, there is no life.
txt_cn: 理想是指路明灯。没有理想，就没有坚定的方向;没有方向，就没有生活。

txt_en: Miracles sometimes occur, but one has to work terribly for them.
txt_cn: 奇迹有时候是会发生的，但是你得为之拼命。

txt_en: We all live in the past. We take a minute to know someone, one hour to like someone, and one day to love someone, but the whole life to forget someone.
txt_cn: 我们每个人都生活在各自的过去中，人们会用一分钟的时间去认识一个人，用一小时的时间去喜欢一个人，再用一天的时间去爱上一个人，到最后呢，却要用一辈子的时间去忘记一个人。

txt_en: The ideals which have lighted my way, and time after time have given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been kindness, beauty and truth.
txt_cn: 一些理想为我指引过道路，并不断给我新的勇气以面对人生的准则，也就是——真、善、美。

txt_en: The important thing in life is to have a great aim and the determination to attain it.
txt_cn: 人生重要的事情就是确定一个伟大的目标，并决心实现它。

txt_en: If a man empties his purse into his head, no man can take it away from him. An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
txt_cn: 倾已所有追求知识，没有人能夺走它;向知识投资，收益最佳。

txt_en: I want to bring out the secrets of nature and apply them for the happiness of man. I don't know of any better service to offer for the short time we are in the world.
txt_cn: 我想揭示大自然的秘密，用来造福人类。我认为，在我们的短暂一生中，最好的贡献莫过于此了。

txt_en: Histories make men wise; poems witty; the mathematics subtle; natural philosophy deep; moral grave; logic and rhetoric able to contend.
txt_cn: 历史使人明智;诗词使人灵秀;数学使人周密;自然哲学使人深刻;伦理使人庄重;逻辑修辞学使人善辨。

txt_en: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
txt_cn: 要理解人生，需要向后看，但要更好地活着必须向前看。

txt_en: The decline of literature indicates the decline of a nation; the two keep in their downward tendency.
txt_cn: 文学的衰落表明一个民族的衰落。这两者走下坡路的时间是齐头并进的。

txt_en: Only those who have the patience to do simple things perfectly ever acquire the skill to do difficult things easily.
txt_cn: 只有有耐心圆满完成简单工作的人，才能够轻而易举地完成困难的事。

txt_en: The world can be changed by man's endeavor, and that this endeavor can lead to something new and better. No man can sever the bonds that unite him to his society simply by averting his eyes.
txt_cn: 人经过努力可以改变世界，这种努力可以使人类达到新的、更美好的境界。没有人仅凭闭目、不看社会现实就能割断自己与社会的联系。

txt_en: If you put out your hands, you are a laborer; if you put out your hands and mind, you are a craftsperson; if you put out your hands, mind, heart and soul, you are an artist.
txt_cn: 如果你用双手工作，你是一个劳力；如果你用双手和头脑工作，你是一个工匠；如果你用双手和头脑工作，并且全身投入，你就是一个艺术家。

txt_en: When an end is lawful and obligatory, the indispensable means to it are also lawful and obligatory.
txt_cn: 如果一个目的是正当而必须做的，则达到这个目的的必要手段也是正当而必须采取的。

txt_en: We often hear of people breaking down from overwork, but in nine cases out of ten they are really suffering from worry or anxiety.
txt_cn: 我们常听人说，人们因为工作过度而垮下来，但是实际上十有八九是因为饱受担忧或焦虑的折磨。

txt_en: Ordinary people merely think how they shall spend their time; a man of talent tries to use it.
txt_cn: 普通人只想到如何度过时间，有才能的人设法利用时间。

txt_en: Every new day begins with possibilities. It’s up to us to fill it with the things that move us toward progress and peace.
txt_cn: 每一天的开始都带来各种新的可能。能否在每一天都做一些让我们走向进步与和平的事情，这都由我们决定。

txt_en: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. Let us move forward with strong and active
txt_cn: 今天的怀疑是对明日成就的唯一限制，让我们怀着坚定和积极的信念面对吧。

txt_en: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun’s rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
txt_cn: 一如阳光必须聚焦方能生热，要全神贯注方能完成当下的工作。

txt_en: Use what talents you possess: the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
txt_cn: 天生我材必有用。若只有声音最悦耳的鸟儿在歌唱，树林该多沉寂。

txt_en: Begin challeging your own assumptions. Your assumptions are your windows on the world. Scrub them off every once in a while, or the light won’t come in.
txt_cn: 挑战自己的认知。你的认知是你观望世界的窗；不时擦拭，光线才能穿透。

txt_en: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
txt_cn: 掌握智慧的重点在于学会选择性地忽视。

txt_en: A ship in port is safe, but that’s not what ships are built for. Sail out to sea and do new things.
txt_cn: 停在港湾里的船是最安全的，但安全不是船追求的目标。扬帆远航，去开创新的事业吧。

txt_en: The one thing that doesn’t abide by majority rule is a person’s conscience.
txt_cn: 有一种东西不能遵循从众原则,那就是人的良心。

txt_en: If you would go up high, then use your own legs! Do not let yourselves carried aloft; do not seat yourselves on other people's backs and heads.
txt_cn: 如果你想走到高处，就要使用自己的两条腿!不要让别人把你抬到高处;不要坐在别人的背上和头上。

txt_en: Our greatest glory consists not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.
txt_cn: 我们最值得自豪的不在于从不跌倒，而在于每次跌倒之后都爬的起来。

txt_en: No pain, no palm; no thorns, no throne; no gall, no glory; no cross, no crown.
txt_cn: 没有播种，何来收获；没有辛劳，何来成功；没有磨难，何来荣耀；没有挫折，何来辉煌。

txt_en: Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit, and you reap a character. Sow a character, and you reap a destiny.
txt_cn: 行为发展成习惯，习惯发展成为性格，性格伴随人的一生。

txt_en: Weep no more, no sigh, nor groan. Sorrow calls no time that's gone.
txt_cn: 别哭泣，别叹息，别呻吟；悲伤唤不回流逝的时光。

txt_en: Our life is frittered away by detail, simplify it, simplify it.
txt_cn: 我们的生活都被琐事浪费掉了，简单点，简单点。

txt_en: Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
txt_cn: 只有经历尝试与磨难，灵魂才能坚强，视野才会清晰，才能激起雄心，获取胜利。

txt_en: If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can't, you're right.
txt_cn: 如果你认为自己行，你就一定行。如果你认为自己不行，那你是对的。

txt_en: A sincere smile is the most beautiful expression.
txt_cn: 真诚的笑脸是人世间最美的表情。

txt_en: Content and riches seldom meet together. Riches take thou, contentment I had rather.
txt_cn: 财富与满足很少能同时拥有。拿走财富吧，我宁愿只要满足。

txt_en: Only a person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.
txt_cn: 只有对自己有信心的人才会对他人守信。

txt_en: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
txt_cn: 衡量一个人的根本标准不是看他在安逸便利时所采取的立场， 而是看他在面临挑战和争论时所持有的立场。

txt_en: The young always have the same problem: how to rebel and conform at the same time. They have now solved this by defying their parents and copying one another.
txt_cn: 年轻人都会受到同一个问题的困扰：怎样在反抗的同时又保持顺从。这个问题现在得到了解决，他们在反抗父母，同时又相互模仿。

txt_en: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
txt_cn: 当遗憾替代梦想的时候，人开始变老。

txt_en: Men are like wine: some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
txt_cn: 人如酒：有些会转变成醋，但出类拔萃者会随着年月增长而日渐香醇。

txt_en: We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from it.
txt_cn: 我们要尽可能为生活增加一些东西，而不是从中索取什么。

txt_en: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
txt_cn: 教育不是注满一桶水，而是点燃一把火。

txt_en: Let the dead have the immortality of fame, but the living the immortality of love.
txt_cn: 让逝者拥有不朽的荣誉，让生者拥有不朽的爱情。

txt_en: Fight for your opinions, but do not believe that they contain the whole truth or the only truth.
txt_cn: 为你自己的观点辩护吧，但不要相信它们会包含全部的真理或唯一的真相。

txt_en: The foundation of knowledge must be laid by reading. General principles must come from books, which, however, must be brought to the test of real life.
txt_cn: 读书是积累知识的基础。基本原理来源于书本，但须经实际生活的检验。

txt_en: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
txt_cn: 人生最大的幸福是坚信有人爱我们。

txt_en: Friendship is both a source of pleasure and a component of good health.
txt_cn: 友谊既是快乐之源泉，又是健康之要素。

txt_en: Laziness is like a lock, which bolts you out of the storehouse of information and makes you an intellectual starveling.
txt_cn: 懒惰就像一把锁，锁住了知识的仓库，使你的智力变得匮乏。

txt_en: Sometimes the most urgent and vital thing you can possibly do is to take a complete rest.
txt_cn: 有时候你能做的最紧急重要的事情就是彻底休息。

txt_en: You'll never move others, heart to heart, unless your speech comes from your heart.
txt_cn: 如果你说的话并非发自你的内心，你就不可能触动别人的心弦。

txt_en: Truth needs no color; beauty, no pencil.
txt_cn: 真理不需色彩，美丽不需涂饰。

txt_en: Money can cure hunger, it cannot cure unhappiness. Food can satisfy the appetite, but not the soul.
txt_cn: 金钱可以充饥，但不能治愈不幸。食物可以饱腹，但却不能满足灵魂的需求。

txt_en: Not ignorance, but the ignorance of ignorance, is the death of knowledge.
txt_cn: 不是无知本身，而是对无知的无知，才是知识的死亡。

txt_en: Nothing is more dangerous than discontinued labor.
txt_cn: 没有什么比半途而废更危险。

txt_en: To choose time is to save time.
txt_cn: 把握时间就是节约时间。

txt_en: No other misfortune can be compared with the loss of time.
txt_cn: 任何一种不幸都无法与时间的失去相比。

txt_en: You can never plan the future by the past.
txt_cn: 永远也不能依照过去来计划将来。

txt_en: Time is a versatile performer. It flies, marches on, heals all wounds, runs out and will tell.
txt_cn: 时间是个多才多艺的表演者。它能展翅飞翔，能阔步前进，能治愈创伤，能消逝而去，也能揭示真相。

txt_en: Death is no more than passing from one room into another.
txt_cn: 死亡只不过是从一个房间进入另一个房间。

txt_en: Important principles may and must be flexible.
txt_cn: 重要的原则能够也必须是灵活的。

txt_en: That is the essence of science: ask an impertinent question, and you are on the way to the pertinent answer.
txt_cn: 科学的本质是：问一个不恰当的问题，于是走上了通往恰当答案的路。

txt_en: When we sighing for the loss of our past youth, which will return no more, let us reflect that decrepitude will come.
txt_cn: 当我们为一去不复返的青春叹息时，我们应该考虑将来的衰老。

txt_en: Ten men banded together in love can do what ten thousand separately would fail in.
txt_cn: 以爱心聚在一起的十个人能够完成一万个分散的人做不到的事情。

txt_en: Imagination is not to be divorced from the facts.
txt_cn: 想象不应该脱离现实。

txt_en: There are two sides to every story, at least.
txt_cn: 每个故事都可以从两个方面看，至少两个方面。

txt_en: Love alone can release the power of the atom, so it will work for man and not against him.
txt_cn: 只有爱才能使原子的力量造福人类，而非危害人类。

txt_en: Scientific knowledge aims at being wholly impersonal.
txt_cn: 科学知识要求完全不受个人感情的影响。

txt_en: Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.
txt_cn: 生活中没有可怕的东西，只有应去了解的东西。

txt_en: Truth is beautiful. Without doubt, and so are lies.
txt_cn: 真理是美的；毫无疑问，谎言也是如此。

txt_en: Growing old is not upsetting; being perceived as old is.
txt_cn: 越来越老并不可怕，可怕的是让人觉得越来越老。

txt_en: Truth has no special time of its own. Its hour is now always.
txt_cn: 真理没有自己特定的时间段。它的时间永远是现在。

txt_en: True science teaches, above all, to doubt and be ignorant.
txt_cn: 真正的科学首先教人怀疑和知道自己无知。

txt_en: Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you get rid of him on the weekends.
txt_cn: 给他一条鱼，你可以喂他一天；教他钓鱼，他周末就不会再来缠你了。

txt_en: To believe with certainty, we must begin with doubting.
txt_cn: 要完全相信，我们首先得怀疑。

txt_en: Even the weariest river winds somewhere safe to sea.
txt_cn: 即使是最疲惫的河流，历经曲折，也终会安然入海。

txt_en: Halloween gives you permission to be silly, to be terrifying, to be weird, and in fact it rewards you for it.
txt_cn: 万圣节这天，你可以尽情享受，或荒唐可笑，或令人害怕，或举止古怪，而你从中也会受益良多。

txt_en: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
txt_cn: 我不缅怀过去的历史，而致力于未来的梦想。

txt_en: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value.
txt_cn: 不要为成功而努力，要为做一个有价值的人而努力。

txt_en: Victory won't come to me unless I go to it.
txt_cn: 胜利是不会向我们走来的，我必须自己走向胜利。

txt_en: A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.
txt_cn: 一个人可以失败很多次，但是只要他没有开始责怪旁人，他还不是一个失败者。

txt_en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. So let us seize it, not in fear, but in gladness.
txt_cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。因此，让我们毫无畏惧，满心愉悦地把握命运。

txt_en: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
txt_cn: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。

txt_en: What I've learned here is that if you believe in the long term, your day eventually arrives.
txt_cn: 我所学到的是，如果你相信看长远，属于你的那一天终究会来临。

txt_en: Winter Begins arrives on November 7 or November 8 each year. At this time of the year, some rivers in China start to freeze.
txt_cn: “立冬”节气，在每年的11月7日或8日。每年的这个时候，中国的河流开始结冰。

txt_en: Spend each day trying to be a little wiser than you were when you woke up.
txt_cn: 每天试着让自己比早上起床时更有智慧一点。

txt_en: If you've got a talent, protect it.
txt_cn: 如果你有某种天份，保护好它。

txt_en: Few things are impossible in themselves, and it is often for want of will, rather than of means, that man fails to succeed.
txt_cn: 事情很少是不可能的；人们之所以不成功，与其说是条件不够，不如说是决心不够。

txt_en: To like and dislike the same things, this is what makes a solid friendship.
txt_cn: 喜欢或不喜欢同样的事，这决定友谊是否坚固。

txt_en: Cease to struggle and you cease to live.
txt_cn: 停止奋斗，你就停止了生活。

txt_en: People of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
txt_cn: 有成就的人显少等着让事情在他们身上发生，他们出门造就事情的发生。

txt_en: One thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning.
txt_cn: 一次痛苦的经验抵得上无数次的警告。

txt_en: That was my way of getting through difficult times of low confidence - hard work.
txt_cn: 我渡过没自信那困难时刻的方法是：努力。

txt_en: You must never be fearful about what you are doing when it is right.
txt_cn: 做事绝不要感到害怕，如果它是对的。

txt_en: When you are convinced that your cause is right, have the courage to take a stand.
txt_cn: 当你相信自己的理由是正当的，就要有勇气守住立场。

txt_en: If you have great talents, industry will improve them; if you have but moderate abilities, industry will supply their deficiency.
txt_cn: 如果你很有天赋，勤勉会使其更加完善；如果你能力一般，勤勉会补足其缺陷。

txt_en: The man who has made up his mind to win will never say impossible.
txt_cn: 下决心取得胜利的人绝不会说“不可能”。

txt_en: The more things you do, the more you can do.
txt_cn: 做的愈多，你会做的就愈多。

txt_en: We don't want to tell our dreams. We want to show them.
txt_cn: 我们不用说出自己的梦想，我们只要秀出它们。

txt_en: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
txt_cn: 科学是井然有序的知识，智慧是井然有序的生活。

txt_en: Be careful how you judge people, most of all friends. You don't sum up a man's life in one moment.
txt_cn: 小心你怎么评断他人，特别是朋友。你不能片刻间总结一个人的人生。

txt_en: Confidence is contagious. So is a lack of confidence.
txt_cn: 自信是会传染的，缺乏自信也是。

txt_en: I will be responsible for my fate. I will not be a burden to anyone.
txt_cn: 我自己的命我自己扛，不连累别人！

txt_en: Life is but the shipwreck of our plans.
txt_cn: 人生不过是计划赶不上变化。

txt_en: At some point, you got to decide for yourself who you're going to be—can't let nobody make that decision for you.
txt_cn: 在某些时刻，你得自己决定要成为什么样的人，不能让别人帮你做决定。

txt_en: Hope is a good thing and maybe the best of things. And no good thing ever dies.
txt_cn: 希望是美好的，也许是人间至善，而美好的事物永不消逝。

txt_en: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
txt_cn: 成功一番事业的唯一途径是热爱自己的事业，如果你还没找到的话，继续寻找，不要屈就。

txt_en: Sometimes your whole life boils down to one insane move.
txt_cn: 人一生中出人头地的机会不多，一旦有了一定要抓住！

txt_en: Do all you can to survive, because life is never something you live only for yourself.
txt_cn: 为了活下来，要拼尽全力，生命本就不仅仅是为你自己。

txt_en: Medalist don't grow on trees， you have to nurture them with love, with hard work, with dedication.
txt_cn: 金牌选手不会从天而降，你必须用热爱、刻苦和投入来浇灌他们。

txt_en: I guess it comes down to a simple choice:get busy living or get busy dying...
txt_cn: 生命可以归结为一种简单的选择：要么忙于生存，要么赶着去死。

txt_en: As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.
txt_cn: 生活就像故事一样：不在乎长短，而在于质量，这才是最重要的。

txt_en: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved
txt_cn: 生活中最大的幸福是坚信有人爱我们。

txt_en: Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass
txt_cn: 生活没有目标就像航海没有指南针。

txt_en: Every man dies, not every man really lives.
txt_cn: 每个人都会死去,但不是每个人都真正活过。

txt_en: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, and today is a gift.
txt_cn: 昨日之日不可留，明日之日未可知，今日之日胜礼物

txt_en: Life was like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're gonna get.
txt_cn: 生命就像一盒巧克力，你永远无法知道下一个是什么味道的。

txt_en: Being genius is not enough, it takes courage to change people's hearts.
txt_cn: 成为天才是不够的，改变人们的想法更需要勇气。

txt_en: Popularity is the slutty little cousin of prestige, my friend.
txt_cn: 声望与威信形影不离。

txt_en: In all that sprawling city, there was everything except an end.
txt_cn: 连绵不绝的城市，什么都有，可唯独没有尽头。

txt_en: Everything you see exists together in a delicate balance.
txt_cn: 世界上所有的生命都在微妙的平衡中生存。

txt_en: I must say a word about fear. It is life’s only true opponent. Only fear can defeat life.
txt_cn: 这里必须说说恐惧，它是生活惟一真正的对手，因为只有恐惧才能打败生活。

txt_en: Work hard!Work will save you. Work is the only thing that will see you through this.
txt_cn: 努力工作!工作能拯救你。埋头苦干可令你忘记痛楚。

txt_en: A little chance encounter could be the one you've waited for.
txt_cn: 一次小小的偶遇，可能就是你期盼已久的邂逅。

txt_en: The important thing in life is to have a great aim , and the determination to attain it.
txt_cn: 人生重要的事情就是确定一个伟大的目标，并决心实现它。

txt_en: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are， it is our choices.
txt_cn: 决定我们成为什么样人的，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择。

txt_en: We're all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
txt_cn: 身在井隅，心向璀璨。

txt_en: This path has been placed before you. The choice is yours alone.
txt_cn: 路就在你脚下，你自己决定。

txt_en: Do not , for one repulse , give up the purpose that you resolved to effect .
txt_cn: 不要只因一次失败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的目的。

txt_en: All happy families are happy alike, all unhappy families are unhappy in their own way.
txt_cn: 幸福的家庭总是相似的，而不幸的家庭则各有各的不幸。

txt_en: I want you to be the very best version of yourself that you can be.
txt_cn: 我所希望的，是你能成为最好的自己！

txt_en: Inspiration is a gift to be given as well as received, and that love begins small but always grows.
txt_cn: 对心的启迪和鼓舞是一个礼物，既可接纳也可赠予，而爱起于微末，却总能茁壮成长。

txt_en: Your mind is like this water. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see, but if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.
txt_cn: 心如此水，乱则不明，但若心如止水，答案便尽现眼前。

txt_en: If every unfolding we experience takes us further along in life, then, we are truly experiencing what life is offering.
txt_cn: 如果我们在人生中体验的每一次转变都让我们在生活中走得更远，那么我们就真正的体验到了生活想让我们体验的东西。

txt_en: Find a truly original idea. It is the only way I will ever distinguish myself. It is the only way I will ever matter.
txt_cn: 找到真正的原创思想。这是唯一能够使我永远与众不同的方法，是唯一能让我举足轻重的方法。

txt_en: You must try things that may not work. And you must not let anyone define your limits because of where you come from. Your only limit is your soul.
txt_cn: 千万不要怕失败，也不要因为出身低就让别人限制了你的发展，成败在于你自己。

txt_en: When you find peace within yourself, you become the kind of person who can live at peace with others.
txt_cn: 当你找到内心的平静，你便成为能和别人和平共处的人。

txt_en: Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
txt_cn: 无法改变想法的人，无法改变任何事。

txt_en: Let the year ahead be the one where all your dreams come true.
txt_cn: 让未来的一年成为你梦想成真的地方。

txt_en: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
txt_cn: 比起任何过去发生的事，我们的未来有更好的事情会发生。

txt_en: You make millions of decisions that mean nothing and then one day your order takes out and it changes your life.
txt_cn: 每天都在做很多看起来毫无意义的决定,但某天你的某个决定就能改变你的一生。

txt_en: Nature has no ups and downs， the earth would not be fruitful achievements.
txt_cn: 自然界没有风风雨雨，大地就不会春华秋实。

txt_en: If you love me, let it be for naught, except for love's sake only.
txt_cn: 如果你爱我，那就不要为了其他，只为爱情。

txt_en: Sometimes we stare so long at a door that is closing that we see too late the one that is open.
txt_cn: 我们有时太久地专注于消失的机会，以致于太晚发现开放的机会。

txt_en: My number one rule is to hope for the best and plan for the worst.
txt_cn: 我的首要原则是：抱最大的希望，做最坏的打算。

txt_en: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
txt_cn: 不要用你的收成来评价你的每一天，而要看你每天播种了多少。

txt_en: You never win with violence. You only win when you maintain your dignity.
txt_cn: 你永远不会以暴力取胜。只有保持尊严才能战胜一切。

txt_en: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
txt_cn: 你可能不能控制所有发生在你身上的事，但是你可以决定不被它们所累。

txt_en: We are the ones obsessed by measurement. The world just pours it out.
txt_cn: 人们总醉心于算计，而世界却倾其所有，慷慨给予。

txt_en: Any profession was worthy of respect to men who for centuries earned bread by the sweat of their brows.
txt_cn: 千百年来，只要肯卖力气，用劳动来换饭吃，任何职业都是值得尊敬的。

txt_en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
txt_cn: 成功不是终点，失败也不是：重要的是继续前进的勇气。

txt_en: We come from a dark abyss, we end in a dark abyss, and we call the luminous interval life.
txt_cn: 我们来自漆黑的深渊，我们归于漆黑的深渊，中间光明的间隔，被我们唤作一生。

txt_en: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who matter don't mind, and those that mind, don't matter.
txt_cn: 做你自己，说出你的感受。因为你在意的人不会介意，而介意的人，你不必在意。

txt_en: In the depths of winter I finally learned there was in me an invincible summer.
txt_cn: 在严冷的冬日，我终于发现，在我心里，有一个永无止境的夏天。

txt_en: It can be said that off year is the prelude of the Spring Festival. This time is known as "early spring day" by the folk people.
txt_cn: 可以说“小年”是“大年”春节的序曲，在民间人们把这段时间称之为“迎春日”。

txt_en: Sometimes the world seems against you. The journey may leave a scar. But scars can heal and reveal just where you are.
txt_cn: 有时似乎整个世界都与你为敌，人生旅途可能会让你伤痕累累。但伤口终会痊愈，也会提醒你，你身在何方。

txt_en: Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
txt_cn: 无论你能做什么，或者梦想能做什么，着手开始吧。大胆就是天赋、能量和魔力的代名词。

txt_en: For attractive lips, speak words of kindness. For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people. For a slim figure, share your food with the hungry.
txt_cn: 若要双唇迷人，要说友善的话；若要眼眸可爱，要看别人的好；若要身材苗条，把你的食物分给饥饿的人。

txt_en: Wisdom is knowing what to do next, skill is knowing how to do it, and virtue is doing it.
txt_cn: 智慧是知道下一步做什么，技能是知道如何做，而美德就是去做。

txt_en: Our fate lives within us, you only have to be brave enough to see it.
txt_cn: 命运是与生俱来的，你得足够勇敢才能看到它。

txt_en: Cheers to a New Year and another chance for us to get it right.
txt_cn: 为了新的一年，为了我们还有机会把事情做好，干杯！

txt_en: The object of a new year is not that we should have a new year, but rather that we should have a new soul.
txt_cn: 新年的目的并非是拥有新的一年，而是拥有一个新的灵魂。

txt_en: Be at war with your vices, at peace with your neighbours, and let every new year find you a better man.
txt_cn: 与恶习作战，与邻里友好相处，在新的一年变得更加优秀。

txt_en: I don't care what they're going to say; Let the storm rage on; The cold never bothered me anyway.
txt_cn: 别人的话，何必在意，就让风暴怒吼，严寒再也无法侵扰我。

txt_en: Never believe that a few caring people can't change the world. For, indeed, that's all who ever have.
txt_cn: 永远不要怀疑一小部分热心的民众能够改变世界。事实上，他们是唯一曾改变世界的人。

txt_en: Have you ever seen the scene of Los Angeles at 4am?
txt_cn: 你见过凌晨四点的洛杉矶吗？

txt_en: As a kid growing up, I never skipped steps. I always worked on fundamentals because I know athleticism is fleeting.
txt_cn: 成长过程中，我从来没有跳过任何一个步骤，致力于打好基础，因为我知道，运动员生涯短暂。

txt_en: Everything negative- pressure, challenges- is all an opportunity for me to rise.
txt_cn: 每件负面的事情-压力、挑战-都是令我崛起的机会。

txt_en: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
txt_cn: 你不用看到整个楼梯，你只需要跨出第一步。

txt_en: Sometimes, even if you know how something’s going to end, that doesn’t mean you can’t enjoy the ride.
txt_cn: 有时候，即使你知道了故事的结局，也不代表你不可以享受它的过程。

txt_en: I know someone in the world is waiting for me, although I've no idea of who he is. But I feel happy every day for this.
txt_cn: 我知道这世上有人在等我，尽管我不知道他是谁。但是因为这样，我每天都非常快乐。

txt_en: It took me 17 years and 114 days to become an overnight success.
txt_cn: 我花了17 年又 114 天的时间才一举成名。

txt_en: Regardless of the outcome for the history of mankind, we have decided to choose hope.
txt_cn: 无论最终结果将人类历史导向何处，我们决定，选择希望。

txt_en: Whatever it is you're scared of doing, do it. Make your mistakes, next year and forever.
txt_cn: 你最害怕什么，去做就是了。勇于犯错，每年都是如此，永远永远。

txt_en: Originality does not consist in saying what no one has ever said before, but in saying exactly what you think yourself.
txt_cn: 新颖不是说别人没说过的话，而是完全说出自己的想法。

txt_en: We are masters of the unsaid words, but slaves of those we let slip out.
txt_cn: 一言未宣，吾为其主；一言既出，吾为其奴。

txt_en: Let's seize the day and live it to the full, and greet the arrival of the year 2020 together.
txt_cn: 让我们只争朝夕，不负韶华，共同迎接2020年的到来。

txt_en: Desire is the starting point of all achievement, not a hope, not a wish, but a keen pulsating desire which transcends everything.
txt_cn: 渴望是所有成就的原点，不是希望、不是愿望，而是一个热切、令人悸动、凌驾一切的渴望。

txt_en: You know some birds are not meant to be caged, their feathers are just too bright.
txt_cn: 你知道，有些鸟儿是注定不会被关在牢笼里的，它们的每一片羽毛都闪耀着自由的光辉。

txt_en: Birds sing after a storm. Why shouldn't people feel as free to delight in whatever sunlight remains to them?
txt_cn: 鸟儿在暴风雨后歌唱，人们为什么在仍是阳光普照的时候还不尽情感受快乐呢？

txt_en: Almost all absurdity of conduct arises from the imitation of those whom we cannot resemble.
txt_cn: 几乎所有荒谬的行为均源自于模仿那些我们不可能雷同的人。

txt_en: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
txt_cn: 只要我成功的决心足够强，失败就永远不会打倒我。

txt_en: Pay attention to the signs of love around you, because you know that life has an end. P.S.: I love you forever.
txt_cn: 留心身边爱的讯号，要知道生命是有尽头的。附注：我永远爱你。

txt_en: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
txt_cn: 我们奋力前行，小舟逆水而上，不断地被浪潮推回到过去。

txt_en: No matter what kind of animal you are, change starts with you.
txt_cn: 天性如何并不重要，重要的是你开始改变。

txt_en: Better not to ignore the past but learn from it instead. Otherwise, history has a way of repeating itself.
txt_cn: 最好不要无视过去，而是从中汲取经验教训，否则，历史会有重演的时候。

txt_en: Some say you’d never meet your heroes,but if you are really blessed,you get them as your parents.
txt_cn: 有些人说你可能一辈子都遇不到自己的英雄，但是如果你足够幸运的话，他们会是你的父母。

txt_en: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
txt_cn: 从别的日子里漂浮到我生命里的云，不再落下雨点或引起风暴了,却只给予我夕阳的天空以色彩。

txt_en: What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.
txt_cn: 为自己做的都会随着死去而消逝，为他人和世界所做的将会延续而不朽。

txt_en: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.
txt_cn: 你越喜欢你自己，你就越不像其他人，而这会使你变得独特。

txt_en: Solitude is the soul's holiday, an opportunity to stop doing for others and to surprise and delight ourselves instead.
txt_cn: 独处是灵魂的假期，你可以不为他人奔忙，只为给自己带来惊喜与喜悦。

txt_en: Repeated psychology tests have proven that telling someone your goal makes it less likely to happen.
txt_cn: 反复的心理测试证实，把自己的目标告诉别人会让目标更不可能实现

txt_en: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
txt_cn: 不完美是一种美，疯狂是一种天分，不靠谱总好过无聊至极。

txt_en: All is riddle, and the key to a riddle…is another riddle.
txt_cn: 所有的事物都是谜团，而解开一个谜的钥匙……是另一个谜。

txt_en: The farther backward you can look, the farther forward you will see.
txt_cn: 你回首看得越远，你向前也会看得越远。

txt_en: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
txt_cn: 想象力比知识更为重要。知识是有限的，而想象力则包围着整个世界。

txt_en: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.
txt_cn: 宣判的人应该亲自挥刀。

txt_en: Don’t bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
txt_cn: 别自寻烦恼的只想比你同时代的人或是先辈们出色，试着比你自己更出色吧。

txt_en: When a good man is hurt, all who would be called good must suffer with him.
txt_cn: 当一个好人受到伤害，所有的好人定将与其同历磨难。

txt_en: Once you do something, you never forget. Even if you can't remember.
txt_cn: 你做过的事，就永远不会忘，即便你会想不起来。

txt_en: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
txt_cn: 孩子害怕黑暗，情有可原;人生真正的悲剧，是成人害怕光明。

txt_en: It's not so important who starts the game,but who finishes it.
txt_cn: 谁开局并不重要，重要的是谁完成了比赛。

txt_en: While the world is full of suffering, it is also full of overcoming it.
txt_cn: 虽然世界充满苦难，但是苦难总是可以战胜的。

txt_en: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
txt_cn: 受苦能突显坚强的灵魂，最明显的特征就是那伤口痊愈的疤痕。

txt_en: The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
txt_cn: 逆境中绽放的花朵，才是最珍贵、最美丽的。

txt_en: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understanding the problems of running a country.
txt_cn: 了解持家难处的女性，较易明白治国之难处。

txt_en: I am a great believer in luck, and I find that the harder I work, the more I have of it.
txt_cn: 我很相信运气，事实上我发现我越努力，我的运气越好。

txt_en: You throw a peach to me,I give you a white jade for friendship.
txt_cn: 投我以木桃，报之以琼瑶。

txt_en: Some of the best lessons are learned from past mistakes.
txt_cn: 吃一堑，长一智。

txt_en: The only thing I want is to awaken all humans on the planet that we are living on Mother Earth.
txt_cn: 我想要提醒这个星球上的人类的唯一一件事就是：我们依赖地球母亲生存。

txt_en: One tends to twist facts to suit theories instead of theories to suit facts.
txt_cn: 人们往往倾向于将事实强加于理论，而非将理论运用于事实。

txt_en: The lives of the dead are recorded in the minds of the living.
txt_cn: 生者记忆中，逝者长存。

txt_en: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
txt_cn: 不要把消费剩下的才储蓄，要先储蓄再消费。

txt_en: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

txt_en: It’s when you start to become really afraid of death that you learn to appreciate life.
txt_cn: 只有当你真正感受到对死亡的恐惧，你才会学到要珍惜生命。

txt_en: It would be a privilege to have my heart broken by you.
txt_cn: 能为你心碎是我最大的荣幸。

txt_en: What drains your spirit drains your body. What fuels your spirit fuels your body.
txt_cn: 消耗你心灵的事物也会消耗你的健康，滋补你心灵的事物也会滋补你的身体。

txt_en: You can nearly always enjoy something, if you make up your mind firmly that you will.
txt_cn: 只要你下决心去做某件事，总能从中找到乐趣。

txt_en: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
txt_cn: 如此渺小的我们，只有通过爱，才能承受宇宙的广漠。

txt_en: The most important kind of freedom is to be what you really are.
txt_cn: 最重要的自由是成为真正的你。

txt_en: There are many things that seem impossible only so long as one does not attempt them.
txt_cn: 很多事情看起来不可能只是因为没有人尝试过。

txt_en: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
txt_cn: 雄心壮志是通往成功的道路，坚持不懈是实现目标的工具。

txt_en: You keep living in the past. You are gonna wind up alone.
txt_cn: 你要是一直活在过去，就会孤独终老。

txt_en: Standing for right when it is unpopular is a true test of moral character.
txt_cn: 站在不受欢迎但却正确的一边，才是真正的道德考验。

txt_en: The definition of the good society is one in which virtue pays.
txt_cn: 有德的人不会吃亏，可谓之好的社会。

txt_en: Simplicity is the shortest path to a solution.
txt_cn: 简化是找到解决办法的最短途径。

txt_en: The old dreams were good dreams. They didn’t work out, but I’m glad I had them.
txt_cn: 曾经的梦都是美梦，虽未成真，但庆幸我曾拥有过。

txt_en: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
txt_cn: 生活的10%是发生在你身上的事，剩下的90%是你如何应对。

txt_en: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
txt_cn: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。

txt_en: We all deserve a standing ovation at least once in our lives.
txt_cn: 每个人都值得大家站起来为他鼓掌一次。

txt_en: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
txt_cn: 成功的秘诀是开始行动。

txt_en: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
txt_cn: 机遇不会自己找上门来，它只会在你开门时出现。

txt_en: Life is just like that sometimes, we’re hoping for a unicorn and we get a goat.
txt_cn: 有时候人生就是如此，我们期待的是独角兽，得到的却是山羊。

txt_en: The size of your dreams must always exceed your current capacity to achieve them.
txt_cn: 你的梦想应该总是比当前的能力要大。

txt_en: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
txt_cn: 抱最好的期望，做最坏的打算，并准备接受意外的惊喜。

txt_en: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
txt_cn: 问题不是止步不前的标志，而是前进的指引。

txt_en: A decade or two will fly like that.
txt_cn: 十年二十年一眨眼就过去了。

txt_en: Inspiration usually comes during work, rather than before it.
txt_cn: 灵感通常来源于工作之中，而不是什么都没做之前。

txt_en: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
txt_cn: 有些人想要它发生，有些人希望它发生，其余的人使它发生。

txt_en: Thinking you can escape life is your problem. You can never escape life.
txt_cn: 自以为可以逃避是你的问题。人是永远无法逃避人生的。

txt_en: Let our advance worrying become advance thinking and planning.
txt_cn: 把事前忧虑花的时间，用在事前的思索与准备上。

txt_en: Just don't be disappointed if there's not a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.
txt_cn: 千万别失望，就算彩虹尽头没有你期待的美好也没关系。

txt_en: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
txt_cn: 少了努力，只有杂草会生长。

txt_en: In one second your whole life can change. It only takes a moment for everything to feel quite different.
txt_cn: 生命真是瞬息万变，只要片刻，一切就截然不同了。

txt_en: No winter lasts forever; no spring skips its turn.
txt_cn: 没有永恒的冬天；没有跳出时序的春天。

txt_en: But don't worry , forgetting the trauma of childbirth is one of the great gifts of the universe.
txt_cn: 但是不用担心，忘记创伤是宇宙赠与的礼物之一。

txt_en: He who reigns within himself and rules his passions, desires, and fears is more than a king.
txt_cn: 可以控制自己，并驾驭自己的热忱、欲望及恐惧的人，比国王更有能耐。

txt_en: All friendship changes, but for the good ones it will only make it stronger.
txt_cn: 所有的友情都会变，但有的改变会让其变得强大。

txt_en: Since you are like no other being ever created since the beginning of time, you are incomparable.
txt_cn: 因为你和有史以来任何人类都不相同，所以你是无可比拟的。

txt_en: When the lord closes a door, somewhere he opens a window.
txt_cn: 当主关上了一扇门，就会在别处打开一扇窗。

txt_en: Whenever people want you to do something they think it's wrong, they say it’s “reality”.
txt_cn: 当人们想要你去做一些他们认为不对的事，他们就会说是“现实”。

txt_en: If we survive danger it steels our courage more than anything else.
txt_cn: 如果我们在危险中生存下来，它将比任何东西都更能增强我们的勇气。

txt_en: Love is what binds us, through fair or stormy weather.
txt_cn: 爱将我们紧紧相连，共度风风雨雨。

txt_en: The crepitation of firecrackers sends off the old year. Sweet wine and spring wind brings warmth into thousands of homes.
txt_cn: 爆竹声中一岁除，春风送暖入屠苏。

txt_en: Home is any four walls that enclose the right person.
txt_cn: 只要人对了，哪里都是家。

txt_en: Love shall be our token; love be yours and love be mine.
txt_cn: 爱是我们的纪念品，属于你也属于我。

txt_en: There are some natures too noble to curb and too lofty to bend.
txt_cn: 有些性情，崇高不可遏，高傲不可屈。

txt_en: Self-esteem is the reputation we acquire with ourselves.
txt_cn: 自尊是我们给自己争取的信誉。

txt_en: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul, and makes us reach for more.
txt_cn: 最好的爱能唤醒灵魂，启发我们追求卓越。

txt_en: It’s not so much how busy you are, but why you are busy.
txt_cn: 重要的不是你有多忙，而是你为何而忙。

txt_en: The universe has to move forward. Pain and loss, they define us as much as happiness or love.
txt_cn: 宇宙必须向前发展。痛苦与失去和幸福与爱一样定义了我们。

txt_en: The real opportunity for success lies within the person and not in the job.
txt_cn: 成功的真正机会在于人而非工作。

txt_en: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.
txt_cn: 吾等目力短亦浅，能见百事待践行。

txt_en: Sometimes it is better to lose and do the right thing than to win and do the wrong thing.
txt_cn: 有时候做对的事而输，比做错的事而赢还要好。

txt_en: There is no birth of consciousness without pain.
txt_cn: 没有伤痛，就不会有醒觉。

txt_en: You’re never really done for as long as you’ve got a good story and someone to tell it to.
txt_cn: 只要你还有个好故事，还有一个能够倾诉的人，你就永远不会完蛋。

txt_en: Being too consumed in fear all the time will result in poor quality of life.
txt_cn: 心中充斥太多的恐惧会让生活品质降低。

txt_en: You go halfway around the world chasing something. And the whole time, it's in your own backyard.
txt_cn: 众里寻他千百度，蓦然回首，那“物”却在灯火阑珊处。

txt_en: A dream doesn’t become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
txt_cn: 梦想的实现不是靠魔法，而是靠汗水、决心与努力。

txt_en: Only those that risk going too far can possibly know how far they can go.
txt_cn: 只有勇于承担风险，敢于走出去的人，才会明白他们到底能走多远。

txt_en: It is the set of the sails, not the direction of the wind that determines which way we will go.
txt_cn: 决定我们去向的不是风的方向，而是如何架起船帆。

txt_en: The person whose calls you always take, that’s the relationship you’re in.
txt_cn: 能让你随时接电话的人，才是你真正在乎的人。

txt_en: There is no pressure when you are making a dream come true.
txt_cn: 当你是在为梦想成真努力时，就不会有压力。

txt_en: An act of true love will thaw a frozen heart.
txt_cn: 出自真爱的行动，可以融化冰冷的心。

txt_en: The task of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it.
txt_cn: 领导者的任务不是赋予人类伟大，而是激发人类伟大。

txt_en: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
txt_cn: 你乐在其中所度过的时间，就不算浪费掉的时间。

txt_en: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
txt_cn: 每个女孩都该做到两点:有品位并光芒四射。

txt_en: Women's value has been under-recognized for far too long.
txt_cn: 女性的价值被低估太久了。

txt_en: Some people choose to see the ugliness in this world. The disarray. I choose to see the beauty.
txt_cn: 一些人选择去看见这个世界的丑陋，混乱，我选择去发现美好。

txt_en: There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
txt_cn: 没有努力，就不会有身体或智能上的成长，而努力意谓干活。

txt_en: It may not be pretty, but we headed to the city.
txt_cn: 其貌虽不扬，扬帆亦远航。

txt_en: Storms make trees take deeper roots.
txt_cn: 越是经历风暴，树木扎根越深。

txt_en: If you don’t want to give in, your only choice is to resist.
txt_cn: 你若不愿屈服，便只能反抗。

txt_en: Doing things change things, no doing things, these things are exactly as they were.
txt_cn: 行动才能改变，没有行动，一切也会原封不动。

txt_en: If no one else guards the world, then I will come forward.
txt_cn: 如果没有别人保卫这个世界，那么我将挺身而出。

txt_en: Through love comes calm, and through calm comes thought.
txt_cn: 爱使人平静，而平静使人思考。

txt_en: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
txt_cn: 永远全力以赴，今日播下的种子，终会得到丰收。

txt_en: We live in a twilight world, and there are no friends at dusk.
txt_cn: 这是一个混沌的世界，黄昏时分无故人。
